Title: Manager Data Scientist
Description:
EY Technology Consulting- Manager Data Scientist

Be the transformative leader that the world needs. It’s yours to build.

In EY Consulting non troverai soltanto un lavoro, ma un’esperienza formativa che ti porterà ad essere il leader di cui abbiamo bisogno. Vogliamo essere la scintilla che dà vita alle tue ispirazioni e al tuo successo. Per questo motivo ti offriamo tutte le risorse, le competenze tecniche specifiche e le community tematiche, per sviluppare i tuoi interessi e le tue ambizioni.

Cerchiamo Transformation leader in grado di guidare trasformazioni complesse attraverso tecnologia, human e innovation, e capaci di coniugare conoscenze tecnologiche e visione del futuro.

Perché dovresti scegliere EY Consulting?

Da subito entrerai a far parte di team e settori diversificati, partecipando attivamente ai processi di trasformazione e di innovazione di aziende, società e Pubbliche Amministrazioni per creare un impatto sul Paese.

Costruirai la carriera che desideri grazie a percorsi di formazione su hard e soft skill, community e hub tecnologici, dove potrai quotidianamente provare, sperimentare e crescere.

Questa è la tua opportunità per sviluppare le tue competenze e per fare qualcosa di eccezionale per te, per noi, per il mondo. The exceptional EY experience, it’s yours to build.

Qual è il contesto in cui verrai inserito?

Come Manager Data Scientist farai parte della divisione AI&Data, entrerai a far parte del team dell'AI&Advanced Analytics che è basato a Milano, Roma, Bari, Cagliari e Trieste.

Ti occuperai di:


Gestione dei progetti end-to-end in ambito advanced analytics
Definizione e progettazione di soluzioni di Machine Learning e analisi dati per i clienti
Definizione e progettazione di sviluppo di modelli predittivi tramite tecniche di Machine Learning e/o Deep Learning per NLP/NLU, Computer Vision, Time Series e analisi dei grafi di conoscenza
Definizione di dashboard e insight per semplificare il processo decisionale degli stakeholder


Requisiti richiesti


Laurea in materie ingegneristiche o scientifiche
Gestione end-to-end di progetti analitici
Almeno 5 anni di esperienza in progetti nel settore industriale, preferibilmente in società di consulenza
Ottima conoscenza di Python e delle librerie per manipolazione dati e sviluppo modelli (pandas, tensorflow, scikit-learn, pytorch, ecc…)
Definizione e progettazione di soluzioni di Machine Learning e analisi dati per i clienti
Conoscenza di strumenti e linguaggi per la manipolazione dei dati: SQL, MongoDB, Neo4j, Spark, ecc..
Conoscenza di modelli predittivi tramite tecniche di Machine Learning e/o Deep Learning
Conoscenza di servizi e micro servizi cloud e di disegno architetturale
Conoscenza di graph DB
Esperienza in ambito di industrializzazione di modelli ML con approccio MLOPS e esperienza di costruzione di pipeline CI/CD


Cosa chiediamo:

Una forte voglia di cambiare il mondo, per il meglio In EY diamo luogo ad una trasformazione, mettendo il nostro purpose - Building a better working world - al centro di tutto ciò che facciamo, e siamo convinti di poter contribuire alla trasformazione del Paese con una forte e precisa idea di futuro e di innovazione.

Cosa offriamo:


Ambiente di lavoro internazionale, all’interno di team diversi e multidisciplinari.
Percorsi di formazione continua per valorizzare il tuo talento.
Hub tecnologici avanzati in cui sperimentare la trasformazione
Supporto di un Counselor, quale guida nella scelta delle esperienze più adatte alle tue ambizioni.
Benefit e programmi di welfare aziendale.
Tutti gli strumenti necessari per avere una carriera orientata alla crescita, alla sperimentazione e alla tecnologia più avanzata


Apri la tua carriera a nuovi scenari di crescita ed entra a far parte del team di EY Consulting.

The exceptional EY experience, it’s yours to build!

Title: Junior Software Developer
Description:
Fulcri è una software house specializzata nello sviluppo di soluzioni di comunicazione che ha fatto dell’eccellenza dei servizi offerti la chiave del proprio successo. Collaborare con noi significa lavorare in un contesto giovane, dinamico e ad alto contenuto tecnologico.




Per il potenziamento del nostro reparto di sviluppo, organizzato in team cross funzionali secondo metodologia Agile, siamo alla ricerca di un/ una Junior Software Developer.




Perché entrare nel team:




Smart working dal 2019: puoi lavorare in modalità ibrida, bilanciando al meglio il lavoro con la tua vita privata.
Flessibilità oraria: organizza la tua giornata sapendo che hai a disposizione un’ampia flessibilità oraria.
Mum&Dad Policy: sei genitore? Puoi beneficiare di un’ulteriore flessibilità oraria per conciliare gli impegni familiari con quelli professionali.
Formazione in orario lavorativo: hai l'opportunità di partecipare a sessioni di formazione durante l'orario di lavoro, grazie alle numerose possibilità di apprendimento proposte.
Percorsi di certificazione: aumenta le tue competenze professionali grazie ai percorsi di certificazione offerti dall’azienda.
Eventi aziendali e team building: divertiti in ottima compagnia durante feste aziendali e attività di team building.




Requisiti:




Laurea in Informatica, Ingegneria Informatica o titolo di studio equivalente;
Conoscenza di almeno uno dei linguaggi di programmazione ad oggetti;
Buona conoscenza della lingua inglese;




Completano il profilo:




Attenzione ai dettagli e proattività;
Ottime capacità comunicative e relazionali.




Sede: Sesto San Giovanni (MI)




Per informazioni sulla nostra politica di protezione dati personali, visita la pagina https://www.fulcri.it/privacy-policy/




Crediamo fermamente nell'equità di trattamento e ci impegniamo a garantire pari opportunità a tutti i dipendenti e candidati indipendentemente da sesso, razza, etnia, religione o qualsiasi altra caratteristica personale.

Show more

Perché entrare nel team:


  • Smart working dal 2019: puoi lavorare in modalità ibrida, bilanciando al meglio il lavoro con la tua vita privata.
  • Flessibilità oraria: organizza la tua giornata sapendo che hai a disposizione un’ampia flessibilità oraria.
  • Mum&Dad Policy: sei genitore? Puoi beneficiare di un’ulteriore flessibilità oraria per conciliare gli impegni familiari con quelli professionali.
  • Formazione in orario lavorativo: hai l'opportunità di partecipare a sessioni di formazione durante l'orario di lavoro, grazie alle numerose possibilità di apprendimento proposte.
  • Percorsi di certificazione: aumenta le tue competenze professionali grazie ai percorsi di certificazione offerti dall’azienda.
  • Eventi aziendali e team building: divertiti in ottima compagnia durante feste aziendali e attività di team building.


Requisiti:


  • Laurea in Informatica, Ingegneria Informatica o titolo di studio equivalente;
  • Conoscenza di almeno uno dei linguaggi di programmazione ad oggetti;
  • Buona conoscenza della lingua inglese;


Completano il profilo:


  • Attenzione ai dettagli e proattività;
  • Ottime capacità comunicative e relazionali.


Sede: Sesto San Giovanni (MI)


Per informazioni sulla nostra politica di protezione dati personali, visita la pagina https://www.fulcri.it/privacy-policy/


Crediamo fermamente nell'equità di trattamento e ci impegniamo a garantire pari opportunità a tutti i dipendenti e candidati indipendentemente da sesso, razza, etnia, religione o qualsiasi altra caratteristica personale.

Title: Artificial Intelligence Technical Specialist
Description:
Role Purpose

Artificial intelligence evolution for the fixed network solutions fulfilment for PA customers

Key Accountabilities And Decision Ownership


Autonomy: Ability to work independently and make informed decisions
Problem Solving: Skill in effectively solving complex problems
Time Management: Excellent time management skills and ability to meet deadlines
Communication: Strong communication skills and ability to collaborate effectively with the team
Continuous Learning: Willingness to continuously learn and update technical skills



Core Competencies, Knowledge And Experience


Programming Languages: Deep knowledge of PHP and Python
Database Management: Proficiency in data manipulation, including structured data tools (e.g., SQL) and unstructured data tools and platforms (e.g., Hadoop, Spark, NoSQL)
Artificial Intelligence: Advanced skills in artificial intelligence, particularly in machine learning and generative AI. Knowledge of machine learning libraries (e.g., scikit-learn, TensorFlow, Pytorch, H20) and fundamental techniques (e.g., clustering, regression, time-series analysis)
Frameworks and Libraries: Familiarity with major frameworks and libraries for PHP, Python, and AI
Experience: At least 5 years of experience in software development roles, preferably in AI-related contexts



Must Have Technical / Professional Qualifications


Deep knowledge of IP-networking (CISCO certifications or equivalents are preferred)
Knowledge of IT process development (ITIL certification is preferred)
NP procedures according to regulatory constraints (optional)
Engineering degree or equivalent
3 years on Tech companies / software house



Key performance indicators


Compliance with PA activation plans
Compliance with SLA on customer activation and GNP for PA
Technical NPS and delivery quality indicators for PA

Title: Generative AI Engineer
Description:
Joining Capco means joining an organisation that is committed to an inclusive working environment where you’re encouraged to #BeYourselfAtWork. We celebrate individuality and recognize that diversity and inclusion, in all forms, is critical to success. It’s important to us that we recruit and develop as diverse a range of talent as we can and we believe that everyone brings something different to the table – so we’d love to know what makes you different. Such differences may mean we need to make changes to our process to allow you the best possible platform to succeed, and we are happy to cater to any reasonable adjustments you may require. You will find the section to let us know of these at the bottom of your application form or you can mention it directly to your recruiter at any stage and they will be happy to help.




About Capco

Capco is a global technology and business consultancy, focused on the financial services sector. We are growing at fast pace in our Italian office, the opportunity for growth is large, accessible, and immediate. We are passionate about helping our clients succeed in an ever-changing industry. Capco is going through a significant growth journey, now is a very good time to join us as we expand our consulting team in Italy.




Role Description:

We are looking for a Generative AI Engineer to join our Data Analytics and AI team. You will be part of the GenAI workforce, responsible for defining strategy for Generative AI internally, and also helping shape and execute clients’ AI transformation agendas. You should have a strong background in machine learning/deep learning/AI and software engineering, and extensive professional experience as either as a consultant or similar advisory corporate role.

Responsibilities

Identify critical business problems that could be solved using Generative AI
Define strategy for Generative AI and how to apply it
Lead the design and build, and be responsible for engineering innovative GenAI products together with our cross-functional team
Continually iterate and scale Generative AI products, whilst listening to the needs of the clients. Create technical standards and blueprint for AI scenarios
Educate the organization both from IT and the business perspectives on Generative AI
Mentor and nurture other engineers to help them grow their skills and expertise




Skills and Experience

Essential skills to succeed

Experience working with large-scale language models
Rich understanding of language models and transformers, vector stores and search algorithms
Large-scale ETL development and engineering experience of high performance, large-scale ML systems
Strong working knowledge of modern software development methodologies and software design pattern (e.g. end-to-end CI/CD process)
Ability to communicate technical concepts effectively to client and partner teams.
Confidence to convey technical advice and guidance to clients.




Bonus points

Financial services industry experience
Experience building applications and use appropriate prompting on generative AI models.
You are a contributor to opensource and always thinking out of the box tooling, using and standardizing with methods of creating APIs, ML/Ops automation and more.
Cloud fundamental or architecture accreditations




Why join Capco?

You will work on engaging projects with some of the largest banks in the world, on projects that will transform the financial services industry.

We offer:

A work culture focused on innovation and building lasting value for our clients and employees
Ongoing learning opportunities to help you acquire new skills or deepen existing expertise
A flat, non-hierarchical structure that will enable you to work with senior partners and directly with clients
A diverse, inclusive, meritocratic culture




Location: Piazza Gae Aulenti 1, Milan

Show more

Location: Piazza Gae Aulenti 1, Milan

Title: Sr. Data Scientist, Generative AI Innovation Center
Description:
Description

Are you looking to work at the forefront of Machine Learning and AI? Would you be excited to apply cutting edge Generative AI algorithms to solve real world problems with significant impact? The Generative AI Innovation Center at AWS is a new strategic team that helps AWS customers implement Generative AI solutions and realize transformational business opportunities. This is a team of strategists, data scientists, engineers, and solution architects working step-by-step with customers to build bespoke solutions that harness the power of generative AI.

You will work directly with customers and innovate in a fast-paced organization that contributes to game-changing projects and technologies. You will design and run experiments, research new algorithms, and find new ways of optimizing risk, profitability, and customer experience.

We’re looking for Senior Data Scientists capable of using GenAI and other techniques to design, evangelize, and implement state-of-the-art solutions for never-before-solved problems.

AWS Sales, Marketing, and Global Services (SMGS) is responsible for driving revenue, adoption, and growth from the largest and fastest growing small- and mid-market accounts to enterprise-level customers including public sector. The AWS Global Support team interacts with leading companies and believes that world-class support is critical to customer success. AWS Support also partners with a global list of customers that are building mission-critical applications on top of AWS services.

Key job responsibilities

As a Senior Data Scientist, you will


Collaborate with AI/ML scientists and architects to Research, design, develop, and evaluate cutting-edge generative AI algorithms to address real-world challenges
Interact with customers directly to understand the business problem, help and aid them in implementation of generative AI solutions, deliver briefing and deep dive sessions to customers and guide customer on adoption patterns and paths to production
Create and deliver best practice recommendations, tutorials, blog posts, sample code, and presentations adapted to technical, business, and executive stakeholder
Provide customer and market feedback to Product and Engineering teams to help define product direction


About The Team

The team helps customers imagine and scope the use cases that will create the greatest value for their businesses, select and train and fine tune the right models, define paths to navigate technical or business challenges, develop proof-of-concepts, and make plans for launching solutions at scale. The GenAI Innovation Center team provides guidance on best practices for applying generative AI responsibly and cost efficiently.

Diverse Experiences

Amazon values diverse experiences. Even if you do not meet all of the preferred qualifications and skills listed in the job description, we encourage candidates to apply. If your career is just starting, hasn’t followed a traditional path, or includes alternative experiences, don’t let it stop you from applying.

Why AWS

Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world’s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating — that’s why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses.

Work/Life Balance

We value work-life harmony. Achieving success at work should never come at the expense of sacrifices at home, which is why flexible work hours and arrangements are part of our culture. When we feel supported in the workplace and at home, there’s nothing we can’t achieve in the cloud.

Inclusive Team Culture

Here at AWS, it’s in our nature to learn and be curious. Our employee-led affinity groups foster a culture of inclusion that empower us to be proud of our differences. Ongoing events and learning experiences, including our Conversations on Race and Ethnicity (CORE) and AmazeCon (gender diversity) conferences, inspire us to never stop embracing our uniqueness.

Mentorship and Career Growth

We’re continuously raising our performance bar as we strive to become Earth’s Best Employer. That’s why you’ll find endless knowledge-sharing, mentorship and other career-advancing resources here to help you develop into a better-rounded professional.

Basic Qualifications


Master's degree in a quantitative field such as statistics, mathematics, data science, business analytics, economics, finance, engineering, or computer science
Relevant experience in building large scale machine learning or deep learning models
Experience communicating across technical and non-technical audiences
Experience in using Python and hands on experience building models with deep learning frameworks like Tensorflow, Keras, PyTorch, MXNet
Fluency in written and spoken English


Preferred Qualifications


Knowledge of AWS tech stack (e.g., AWS Redshift, S3, EC2, Glue)
PhD degree in Computer Science, or related technical, math, or scientific field
Proven knowledge of Generative AI and hands-on experience of building applications with large foundation models
Proven knowledge of AWS platform and tools
Hands-on experience of building ML solutions on AWS
High impact thought leadership in AI/ML space through blog posts, public presentations, social media visibility, or publications.


Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.


Company - AWS EMEA SARL (Italy Branch)

  • Hands-on experience of building ML solutions on AWS
  • High impact thought leadership in AI/ML space through blog posts, public presentations, social media visibility, or publications.

Job ID: A2653743

Title: Project Developer
Description:
Job Title: Project Developer - Battery Storage




Location: Milan, Italy




Who are we recruiting for?

We are on the hunt for a successful and motivated Renewable Energy Business Development Leader on behalf of our client, a global leader in the battery storage sector. This is a unique opportunity for an accomplished professional to join a vibrant and growing team dedicated to advancing the renewable energy landscape across Europe.




What will you be doing?

As a Renewable Energy Business Development Leader, you will be:

Originating and managing large-scale Battery Storage and Solar-plus-Storage project development opportunities, ensuring site control, interconnection, and permitting processes are successfully navigated.
Directing project development activities to achieve Notice to Proceed (NTP) status by leading relationships with developers, authorities, landowners, grid operators, offtakers, and advisors.
Leading commercial negotiations and deal structuring for project acquisitions or partnership agreements, such as Development Services Agreements or Joint Development Agreements.
Coordinating with cross-functional teams, including Legal, Technical Solution, Finance, and Project Delivery, to ensure project success.
Driving financial modeling efforts to assess and optimize project economics.
Prospecting and securing greenfield and brownfield sites for future development.
Staying informed on market developments, industry policies, and regulations to identify and capitalize on new business opportunities.




Are you the ideal candidate?

You are the ideal candidate if you have:

A strong track record of successfully negotiating and closing commercial transactions with stakeholders such as Landlords, Developers, Utilities, Technical Advisors, Regulatory Agencies, and Offtakers.
A BS degree (MBA or relevant master’s degree preferred).
Deep knowledge of the Solar/Storage industry, including regional regulations and market mechanisms.
Experience in areas like IPP project acquisition, community solar, national and regional grid analysis, multinational environments, legal frameworks, and full-cycle development is highly desirable.




What’s in it for you?

Competitive salary with performance-based bonuses.
Significant opportunities for career growth within a global leader in renewable energy.
Comprehensive benefits package, including pension, healthcare, and childcare vouchers.
A dynamic and supportive company culture that values innovation and sustainability.
The chance to lead groundbreaking projects that contribute to the global transition to clean energy.




Who are we?

Executive Integrity is a global executive search and recruitment consultancy for a more sustainable world with a focus on talent within the Maritime and Renewable Energy sectors. We give a proportion of all our profits to Renewable World, a charity that develops affordable and innovative renewable energy solutions to poverty-stricken communities.

Show more

Title: Data Scientist - categorie protette Legge 68/99 (He/She/They)
Description:
Inclusyon è la società di ricerca e selezione specializzata nel recruiting di personale qualificato appartenente alle categorie protette. Conoscenza dettagliata della normativa (Legge 68/99) e consolidata esperienza in ambito HR si fondono in un approccio consulenziale in grado di soddisfare le esigenze di recruitment della tua azienda, in qualunque settore e per qualsiasi profilo professionale.

Posizione:

Inclusyon è la società di ricerca e selezione specializzata nel recruiting di personale qualificato appartenente alle categorie protette.

Il contesto:

Per importante azienda leader nel settore Fintech, Inclusyon ricerca un/a Data Scientist - categorie protette Legge 68/99.

Il ruolo:


Ricercare, progettare e implementare algoritmi di apprendimento automatico appropriati.
Selezione di set di dati e metodi di rappresentazione dei dati appropriati.
Esecuzione di test di apprendimento automatico, esperimenti ed esecuzione di analisi statistiche.
Presentare in modo chiaro e conciso risultati complessi utilizzando visualizzazioni di dati intuitive e belle.
Estensione delle librerie e dei framework AI/ML esistenti.
Essere sempre aggiornati sugli ultimi sviluppi e sulle innovazioni nel settore.
Lavorare senza problemi come parte del team di ricerca e sviluppo e collaborare con diverse funzioni aziendali durante l'intero ciclo di vita dei progetti.


Requisiti:

Requisiti primari:


Laurea magistrale o dottorato in Ingegneria, Informatica, Statistica, Fisica, Matematica o campi tecnici correlati.
Esperienza lavorativa pregressa in un'industria, università o laboratorio governativo, in un ruolo con enfasi primaria sulla ricerca sull'intelligenza artificiliale.
Ottime competenze nella modellazione statistica e nell'apprendimento automatico, in particolare tecniche quali bagging, random forests, gradient boosting, tecniche di ottimizzazione degli iperparametri, modelli bayesiani, reti neurali, analisi delle serie temporali, elaborazione dei segnali, ecc.
Esperienza di codifica rilevante in linguaggi di programmazione come Python (o equivalenti).
Eccellenti capacità di lavoro di squadra.
Creatività e capacità di formulare problemi e risolverli sia in team che in autonomia.
Disponibilità a lavorare per raggiungere obiettivi di ricerca ambiziosi a lungo termine, identificando al contempo traguardi intermedi e rispettando le scadenze.
Buona conoscenza della lingua inglese.


Requisiti secondari:


Conoscenza del funzionamento dei mercati finanziari.
Conoscenza del framework JAVA e Spring.
Competenza in SQL.
Conoscenza dei sistemi di controllo delle versioni (GIT).
Conoscenza di AWS.
Interesse per strumenti e framework Big Data come Apache Spark.


Altre informazioni:

Sede di lavoro: Milano (MI)

Modalità di lavoro: ibrida

Orario di lavoro: 09.00 - 18.00.
Show more

  • Laurea magistrale o dottorato in Ingegneria, Informatica, Statistica, Fisica, Matematica o campi tecnici correlati.
  • Esperienza lavorativa pregressa in un'industria, università o laboratorio governativo, in un ruolo con enfasi primaria sulla ricerca sull'intelligenza artificiliale.
  • Ottime competenze nella modellazione statistica e nell'apprendimento automatico, in particolare tecniche quali bagging, random forests, gradient boosting, tecniche di ottimizzazione degli iperparametri, modelli bayesiani, reti neurali, analisi delle serie temporali, elaborazione dei segnali, ecc.
  • Esperienza di codifica rilevante in linguaggi di programmazione come Python (o equivalenti).
  • Eccellenti capacità di lavoro di squadra.
  • Creatività e capacità di formulare problemi e risolverli sia in team che in autonomia.
  • Disponibilità a lavorare per raggiungere obiettivi di ricerca ambiziosi a lungo termine, identificando al contempo traguardi intermedi e rispettando le scadenze.
  • Buona conoscenza della lingua inglese.

Requisiti secondari:

  • Conoscenza del funzionamento dei mercati finanziari.
  • Conoscenza del framework JAVA e Spring.
  • Competenza in SQL.
  • Conoscenza dei sistemi di controllo delle versioni (GIT).
  • Conoscenza di AWS.
  • Interesse per strumenti e framework Big Data come Apache Spark.

Altre informazioni:

Sede di lavoro: Milano (MI)

Modalità di lavoro: ibrida

Orario di lavoro: 09.00 - 18.00.

Title: Software Engineer for AI Training Data (JavaScript/Swift)
Description:
Tech Stack

It does not matter which programming language is your primary and we accept engineers with JavaScript (however, you must be willing to work using Swift). Previous Swift experience is not required and we provide basic training.

Accepted Locations

We are accepting applicants from the US, Canada, and most countries in LATAM and Europe. We are accepting some countries in Africa and Asia. For the full list of accepted locations, click here. This work is 100% remote.

Loom Video

Our Founder/CEO, Gabe Greenberg, created a more in depth Loom video that we highly recommend you watch! Check it out here: https://www.loom.com/share/5a8972c7fbbf46aaa3f389b2b6391c40

Job Overview

We are currently seeking Developers for project-specific roles focused on RLHF. This role will play a key part in our reinforcement learning from human feedback (RLHF) initiatives, contributing to cutting-edge projects.

You’ll join an expert annotation team to create training data for for the worlds most advanced AI models. No previous AI experience is necessary. You'll get your foot in the door with one of the biggest players in the AI/LLM space today. We are seeking software engineers with 4+ years of experience to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. We currently have 200+ roles open!

What Will I Be Doing?


Evaluating the quality of AI-generated code, including human-readable summaries of your rationale
Solve coding problems, writing functional and efficient code
Writing robust test cases to confirm code works efficiently and effectively
We asked the technical project manager to go into even more detail and this is how he answered: It is solving coding challenges, creating instructions to help others, reviewing the code before it goes into the model, and there's a ton of variety in the projects. We have everything from "which piece of Python code is better?" to "make a full mobile application using this chatbot, and improve the chatbot's responses afterwards to make it faster"


Contract Length


This project is expected to last until the end of September and you'll be able to continue to work on other projects (though likely not in Swift).
You can end the contract at any time.


Flexible Schedules


Developers can set their own hours - ideal candidates will be interested in spending 15+ hours a week. They will be with teams, so strong performers will adapt to the urgency of projects and stay engaged, but incredibly flexible on working hours.
Take a 3 hour lunch, no problem. You are paid according to time spent on the platform, which is calculated in the coding exercises, as opposed to tracking your own hours.


Compensation


US: $50 /hr
Brazil: $28.70/hr
Egypt: $22.05/hr
Phillipines: $25.55/hr
All other countries: $35/hr
Expectations are 15+ hours per week however there is no upper limit. We have engineers working 20-40 hrs per week and some that are working 40+ hours per week. You can work as much as you want to. You'll get paid on a weekly basis. You get paid per hour of work done on the platform.


Interview Process

We've created a 3.5 hour screening and onboarding process to join as a Software Engineer for AI Training Data which can be accomplished in 1 week or less. We purposely perform most of these steps asynchronously because most of the RLHF work is async and self guided. After you apply, if you look like a good fit we'll provide you access to the G2i dashboard to go through this simple screening process.

Step 1: Learn in depth about the role (35 min)

Step 2: Perform a simple RLHF code review (35 min)

Step 3: Receive platform credentials, pass ID verification (5 min), and choose your project (30 min).

Step 4: Perform a production level RLHF task (75 min) "aka the final interview"

Join us: Based on your final interview, you'll will put you on the right difficulty RLHF project

Title: AWS Machine Learning Consultant
Description:
Lavora al cuore del cambiamento In Accenture, potrai portare la tua visione innovativa al cuore del cambiamento, lavorando con le aziende più importanti a livello mondiale per trasformare interi settori di mercato. Modella il futuro del business e della tecnologia sviluppando soluzioni all'avanguardia in grado di generare nuovo valore. °

Il tuo ruolo e le tue prospettive Entra a far parte del nostro network internazionale di talenti in ambito AWS. Lavorerai con tecnologie innovative su progetti entusiasmanti, sviluppando per i nostri clienti soluzioni personalizzate per promuovere l'evoluzione infrastrutturale e digitale. In particolare, potrai:



Implementare soluzioni tecnologiche basate su cloud AWS


Definire l’architettura da proporre ai clienti


Confrontarti con diverse realtà ed esperienze all’interno del tuo team


Accedere ad una vasta libreria di risorse per il proseguimento del tuo percorso di certificazione AWS


Essere parte del cambiamento



Le tue caratteristiche Se condividi la nostra passione per il Cloud e hai le seguenti caratteristiche, ti stiamo aspettando:



Almeno 2 anni di esperienza su infrastruttura AWS


Conoscenza dei meccanismi di encryption


Conoscenza dei sistemi di Data Ingestion


Conoscenza dei concetti di Data Modeling


Conoscenza meccanismi di ETL


Conoscenza dei prodotti e architetture ML su AWS


Conoscenza di Lambda e ambienti Serverless


Capacità di scripting


Conoscenza di almeno uno tra i seguenti linguaggi di programmazione: Python, NodeJs, Javascript, C#


Gradita Certificazione AWS Certified Machine Learning Specialist



Show more

Title: Software Control Engineer
Description:
Gruppo Multinazionale, leader mondiale nella progettazione e costruzione di carrelli elevatori per la movimentazione merci col marchio Hyster e Yale, 6.000 dipendenti in tutto il mondo, ricerca per la propria sede italiana di Milano:




Control and Software Engineer




Descrizione della posizione: La figura ricercata parteciperà attivamente allo sviluppo di nuovi veicoli elettrici Warehouse, dalla fase di design fino all’innovazione in ambito produttivo. In particolare si occuperà di:




Gestione in autonomia di progetti di integrazione di sistemi Hardware e Software per il controllo di veicoli elettrici con pilota o automatici
Sviluppo e verifica sistemi di controllo embedded tramite Matlab/Simulink e programmazione C
Sviluppo di soluzioni innovative funzionali alla realizzazione di macchine automatiche (e.g. Machine learning, embedded AI, Machine vision)
Sviluppo di sistemi di data mining per predictive maintenance e performance optimization
Gestione degli sviluppi congiunti con i fornitori onde garantire le performance richieste.




Requisiti richiesti:




Laurea in Ing. Informatica, Automazione o Elettronica con esperienza di programmazione e sviluppo SW
Conoscenza di sistemi di programmazione embedded e per PC (linguaggio C o equivalente)
Gradita esperienza di sviluppo sistemi di controllo tramite Matlab/Simulink
Gradita esperienza lavorativa (1-2 anni) nello sviluppo di Sistemi di Controllo embedded in ambito Automotive o Veicoli Elettrici (Preferibilmente nel settore material handling)
Gradita esperienza e interesse verso Machine learning, Data mining e automazione
Ottima conoscenza della lingua inglese scritta e parlata
Ottime capacità di comunicazione scritta e verbale
Spiccate capacità di lavoro di gruppo in ambito sia locale che internazionale.
Show more

  • Gestione degli sviluppi congiunti con i fornitori onde garantire le performance richieste.

Title: Front End Developer - Team AI - MILANO [DIG]
Description:
Trasforma le tue aspirazioni professionali in una storia di successo, entra in PwC come Front End Developer, nel team AI

Your Perspectives

La risorsa verrà inserita all’interno del Centro di Eccellenza di Artificial Intelligence in PwC, e si occuperà del disegno e dello sviluppo di interfacce utente per fornire soluzioni business-ready ai clienti, in ambito di progetti AI.

Your unique strengths


Avere conseguito una laurea in Ingegneria Informatica, Informatica, discipline tecnico scientifiche affini.
Esperienza nella progettazione e sviluppo di interfacce utente responsive utilizzando Angular
Conoscenza delle best practice di Angular e capacità di implementarle
Conoscenza delle tecnologie correlate come HTML, CSS e JavaScript
Capacità di gestire il ciclo di vita completo dello sviluppo dell'interfaccia utente, dalla progettazione alla messa in produzione
Saper lavorare con entusiasmo e avere capacità di relazionarsi proattivamente con gli altri componenti del team. Riuscire a mettersi in gioco e lavorare in un ambiente positivo e innovativo fornendo sempre nuovi spunti, idee creative e innovative
Conoscenza della lingua inglese


Set your expectation higher

PwC ti sorprenderà con un’opportunità di carriera che ti farà sentire al centro della società, dell’innovazione e del cambiamento. Il tuo talento e la tua curiosità avranno tutto lo spazio che meritano e, attraverso l’identificazione delle migliori risorse, contribuirai a garantire la qualità dei servizi che offriamo ai nostri clienti.

In questo percorso di crescita sarai accompagnato da colleghi esperti e da una formazione continua e su misura grazie alla quale potrai mettere le tue competenze a disposizione dei clienti interni.

Feel at home

Amiamo le nostre persone e ci prendiamo cura di tutti abbracciando le diversità e creando valore per i clienti, le persone e la comunità, nel rispetto dell'ambiente. GIVE YOUR LIFE A DIFFERENT PERSPECTIVE

Title: Junior Software Developer
HTML:
MainStreaming® is an intelligent media delivery company that empowers enterprises, media and gaming companies to ensure the best Quality of Experience to their audience, through its revolutionary AI-powered technology.

It optimizes the viewing experience with its Intelligent Media Deliver Platform (iMDP), the first platform designed to guarantee full governance over the streaming process, the highest Quality of Service and the best Return on Investment.

For our brand-new office located in Milano Bicocca we are looking for a:


JUNIOR SOFTWARE DEVELOPER


Job Description:

MainStreaming is in a scaling phase; our team is going to expands internationally and the heart of our product the R&D team is looking for new talents to join us. In order to improve everyday our platform, we are looking for a talented Junior Software Developer who helps us on tons of new projects like web portals and web applications for the management of media contents (media player, media manager) and also for the CDN side configuration.


Key Responsibilities:

  • You will participate in the design and development of software applications dedicated for the video streaming by collaborating closely with multi-disciplinary teams;
  • Be responsible for the code performance;
  • Develop and manage internal and public web applications;
  • You will propose, evaluate and adopt new technologies to maximize the efficiency of development;
  • Deliver testable, maintainable and high-quality code and take operational responsibility for the components that you develop.


What We're Looking for:

  • PASSION FOR THE PRODUCT: Professional attitude towards software craftsmanship including testing and a passion for writing good documentation.
  • PROACTIVITY: You are confident enough to self-start your project and set your priority in autonomy while working with a group of international peers.
  • EAGERNESS TO LEARN: You don't get scared of something new, we provide you an environment where you can improve every day.
  • TEAMWORK: A high degree of collaboration, we are a team, we develop and grow together.
  • ENGLISH: Conversational level, you will share your time within an international Team.

Skills:

  • Previous programming experience with at least one of the following programming languages: C#, java, python;
  • Basic knowledge ofJavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, SASS, and LESS;
  • Basic knowledge ofJS tools: NodeJS, npm, Automation tools (Webpack/Lint);
  • Basic knowledge of version control systems:GIT;
  • Interest in develop skills with one of modern JS Framework (Angular, React, VueJS);
  • Basic experience withUnit Testing, Test Driven development.


What we offer:

  • A young, dynamic and entrepreneurial environment where to develop and growth;
  • An innovative technology and service able to support the transition from traditional broadcasting to the streaming entertainment of the future;
  • A growth path aimed at improving your professionalism;
  • Flexible working hours;
  • Breakfast, lunch and snacks in our office;
  • Access to E-Learning platform;
  • Health Insurance.


Salary and benefits will be assessed in relation to the candidate's experience and skills


In MainStreaming you will be part of a dynamic, flexible, young, tight-knit and international environment and will have the chance to work in a company that values innovation, out of the box thinking, its employees and committed in making the world a better place.


MainStreaming is an equal opportunity employer and values diversity. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, nationality, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status or disability status.


La ricerca è rivolta a candidati di ambo i sessi. I candidati interessati possono inviare un curriculum vitae con l'autorizzazione al trattamento dei dati personali ai sensi del D.Lgs 196/03 e “Codice in materia di protezione dei dati personali” e dell’art. 13 GDPR 679/16 – “Regolamento europeo sulla protezione dei dati personali”.

Title: Senior AI Engineer
Description:
SENIOR AI ENGINEER

Entra nel nostro mondo.

Trasforma insieme a noi.

Quale sarà la tua sfida?

Il nostro team di Artificial Intelligence Engineering si impegna a supportare i clienti nel percorso di adozione dell’intelligenza artificiale attraverso la realizzazione di factory di soluzioni di AI, azionabili e integrate nell'architettura e nei processi aziendali.

La figura dell’AI Engineer progetta soluzioni software di Machine Learning (ML) scalabili per i casi d'uso dei clienti e le industrializza per l’esecuzione in produzione garantendo i livelli richiesti di performance, sicurezza e governabilità.

L’AI Engineer lavora a stretto contatto con altre figure di Bip xTech, come Cloud Data Architect, Data Scientist e Data Engineer, per realizzare soluzioni AI di alta qualità sotto ogni aspetto, disegnando e implementando: piattaforme MLOps, architetture dati e AI, modelli di AI, applicazioni e altro ancora.

L’AI Engineer inoltre contribuirà alla Bip xTech Data Community con attività di ricerca, scouting tecnologico, concept di nuove soluzioni e sviluppo del business sui clienti di BIP.

Sarai tu a entrare nel nostro team? 

Requisiti fondamentali


Laurea specialistica in Ingegneria Informatica, Data Science, Informatica o discipline affini (STEM).
Esperienza pregressa di almeno 5 anni nello sviluppo di software in almeno un linguaggio, come per esempio: Python, Scala, e/o simili.
Esperienza nel disegno di soluzioni software e nell’implementazione di strutture dati, algoritmi.
Esperienza nell’utilizzo degli strumenti di Code Repository e CI/CD.
Conoscenza di framework di versionamento di dati e/o modelli (esempio: MLFlow, DVC, WanDB…).
Conoscenza dei concetti, algoritmi e metodologie di Machine Learning e Gen AI.
Esperienza con linguaggi SQL per il design, query e gestione dei database; esperienza nell’utilizzo di linguaggi SQL per le attività di ETL;
Esperienza in attività di coordinamento e crescita di un team o più team di progetto, pre-sales e delivery;
Indispensabile la conoscenza fluente di italiano e inglese professionali.


Plus


Esperienza nell’utilizzo delle principali piattaforme cloud (esempio: Google, AWS, Azure) e relativi servizi di Cloud Foundation, Data Platform e AI.
Esperienza con tecniche di allenamento e fine-tuning di reti neurali (esempio: superconvergenza, PEFT, LORA…).
Conoscenza di tecniche di semi-supervised e self-supervised learning.
Esperienza con framework di lavoro AGILE (esempio: Scrum, Kanban).


Soft Skills:


Standing consulenziale
Spiccate doti comunicative e interpersonali
Capacità di collaborazione in team
Flessibilità e stress tolerance nel rispetto delle scadenze
Disponibilità di trasferte in Italia o all’estero


Perchè Bip?

People at the center of our culture

Fiducia e collaborazione, imprenditorialità e coraggio, meritocrazia e sviluppo guidano la crescita delle nostre persone.

Lavorare in BIP è un'esperienza sfidante, in cui il merito paga e l'innovazione avviene attraverso idee coraggiose, collaborazione e un rapporto di fiducia con i nostri clienti. 

Challenge yourself

Avrai la possibilità di metterti alla prova in contesti progettuali diversi in termini di ambito, natura delle attività e stakeholders coinvolti. Vedrai valorizzato il tuo spirito di iniziativa, la tua passione, l’autonomia e la capacità di assumerti responsabilità e metterti in gioco.

Unlocking your potential

Potrai partecipare a + di 300 corsi formativi all’avanguardia per accrescere le tue competenze su tecnologie e temi di business emergenti.

Work-life Integration

Troverai una policy che supporta lo smartworking fino al 100% del proprio tempo e favorisce il work-life integration.

Diversity, Equity & Inclusion

Valorizziamo l’unicità e ci impegniamo a garantire che tutti abbiano pari opportunità di dare un contributo ed esprimere al massimo il potenziale nell'ambiente di lavoro.

Il nostro approccio alla diversità e all’inclusione si fonda sui principi di etica e integrità e rappresenta il fattore determinante per lo sviluppo di orizzonti, di crescita personale e aziendale, più ampi.

Promuoviamo l’inserimento e l’integrazione lavorativa delle persone appartenenti alle categorie protette – in base a quanto disciplinato dalla legge 68/99 –.

Next Steps

Una volta ricevuto il tuo cv ci prenderemo del tempo per valutarlo attentamente.

Se c’è un match con questa o con altre posizioni aperte all’interno del Gruppo, ti contatteremo per iniziare la nostra conoscenza reciproca.

L’iter di selezione comprende generalmente un colloquio con HR, un colloquio tecnico con un line manager ed un eventuale colloquio con un Partner.

L’ordine e il numero delle interviste potrebbero variare a seconda delle esigenze di recruiting.

In alternativa, saremo felici di conservare il tuo CV nel nostro database per poterlo rivalutare per altre opportunità future.

Se dovessi identificare ulteriori posizioni di tuo interesse ed in linea con il tuo profilo, aspettiamo la tua candidatura per poterla valutare nuovamente.

Su di Noi

Nati nel 2003, abbiamo raccolto e valorizzato l’esperienza storica della consulenza e abbiamo aggiunto due ingredienti chiave: l’innovazione e la digitalizzazione.

Grazie a questo percorso siamo oggi oltre 5000 professionisti e professioniste, presenti in 13 Paesi, con oltre 4500 progetti alle spalle e le conoscenze più all’avanguardia nell'ambito della Digital Transformation, Data Science, Cybersecurity, Industry 4.0, IOT e di tutte le Disruptive Technologies che mettiamo a servizio di ogni settore di mercato.

Aiutiamo i nostri clienti a fare la differenza creando qualità su larga scala attraverso una formula che opera su tre leve: Valore, Persone e Tecnologia.

Crediamo nel valore dell’eccellenza, che è la bussola su cui orientiamo il nostro agire, e adottiamo un approccio etico e leale nei confronti di quante e quanti scelgono di lavorare con noi, promuovendo un ambiente in cui le persone possano crescere insieme, grazie alla contaminazione tra competenze diverse.


Show more
HTML:
SENIOR AI ENGINEER

Entra nel nostro mondo.

Trasforma insieme a noi.

Quale sarà la tua sfida?

Il nostro team di Artificial Intelligence Engineering si impegna a supportare i clienti nel percorso di adozione dell’intelligenza artificiale attraverso la realizzazione di factory di soluzioni di AI, azionabili e integrate nell'architettura e nei processi aziendali.

La figura dell’AI Engineer progetta soluzioni software di Machine Learning (ML) scalabili per i casi d'uso dei clienti e le industrializza per l’esecuzione in produzione garantendo i livelli richiesti di performance, sicurezza e governabilità.

L’AI Engineer lavora a stretto contatto con altre figure di Bip xTech, come Cloud Data Architect, Data Scientist e Data Engineer, per realizzare soluzioni AI di alta qualità sotto ogni aspetto, disegnando e implementando: piattaforme MLOps, architetture dati e AI, modelli di AI, applicazioni e altro ancora.

L’AI Engineer inoltre contribuirà alla Bip xTech Data Community con attività di ricerca, scouting tecnologico, concept di nuove soluzioni e sviluppo del business sui clienti di BIP.

Sarai tu a entrare nel nostro team? 

Requisiti fondamentali
  • Laurea specialistica in Ingegneria Informatica, Data Science, Informatica o discipline affini (STEM).
  • Esperienza pregressa di almeno 5 anni nello sviluppo di software in almeno un linguaggio, come per esempio: Python, Scala, e/o simili.
  • Esperienza nel disegno di soluzioni software e nell’implementazione di strutture dati, algoritmi.
  • Esperienza nell’utilizzo degli strumenti di Code Repository e CI/CD.
  • Conoscenza di framework di versionamento di dati e/o modelli (esempio: MLFlow, DVC, WanDB…).
  • Conoscenza dei concetti, algoritmi e metodologie di Machine Learning e Gen AI.
  • Esperienza con linguaggi SQL per il design, query e gestione dei database; esperienza nell’utilizzo di linguaggi SQL per le attività di ETL;
  • Esperienza in attività di coordinamento e crescita di un team o più team di progetto, pre-sales e delivery;
  • Indispensabile la conoscenza fluente di italiano e inglese professionali.


Plus
  • Esperienza nell’utilizzo delle principali piattaforme cloud (esempio: Google, AWS, Azure) e relativi servizi di Cloud Foundation, Data Platform e AI.
  • Esperienza con tecniche di allenamento e fine-tuning di reti neurali (esempio: superconvergenza, PEFT, LORA…).
  • Conoscenza di tecniche di semi-supervised e self-supervised learning.
  • Esperienza con framework di lavoro AGILE (esempio: Scrum, Kanban).


Soft Skills:
  • Standing consulenziale
  • Spiccate doti comunicative e interpersonali
  • Capacità di collaborazione in team
  • Flessibilità e stress tolerance nel rispetto delle scadenze
  • Disponibilità di trasferte in Italia o all’estero


Perchè Bip?

People at the center of our culture

Fiducia e collaborazione, imprenditorialità e coraggio, meritocrazia e sviluppo guidano la crescita delle nostre persone.

Lavorare in BIP è un'esperienza sfidante, in cui il merito paga e l'innovazione avviene attraverso idee coraggiose, collaborazione e un rapporto di fiducia con i nostri clienti. 

Challenge yourself

Avrai la possibilità di metterti alla prova in contesti progettuali diversi in termini di ambito, natura delle attività e stakeholders coinvolti. Vedrai valorizzato il tuo spirito di iniziativa, la tua passione, l’autonomia e la capacità di assumerti responsabilità e metterti in gioco.

Unlocking your potential

Potrai partecipare a + di 300 corsi formativi all’avanguardia per accrescere le tue competenze su tecnologie e temi di business emergenti.

Work-life Integration

Troverai una policy che supporta lo smartworking fino al 100% del proprio tempo e favorisce il work-life integration.

Diversity, Equity & Inclusion

Valorizziamo l’unicità e ci impegniamo a garantire che tutti abbiano pari opportunità di dare un contributo ed esprimere al massimo il potenziale nell'ambiente di lavoro.

Il nostro approccio alla diversità e all’inclusione si fonda sui principi di etica e integrità e rappresenta il fattore determinante per lo sviluppo di orizzonti, di crescita personale e aziendale, più ampi.

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
The Company:




Exsolvæ is a data consultancy based in Brussels, Belgium. We are dedicated to fostering a culture of knowledge sharing among data professionals.

Our goal is not only to excel in one discipline, but also to gain a comprehensive understanding of the challenges spread across the four pillars of our expertise:




Data Foundations: Data Engineering to Design, develop, and maintain data architecture and infrastructure, build data pipelines, etc.
BI, Data Analytics & Visualization: Design and implement data visualization solutions that enable to gain insights from the data.
Data Science & Artificial Intelligence: Implement & Develop algorithms in Deep Learning, Machine Learning & Artificial Intelligence.
Data Governance & Strategy: Strategic consultancy for acquisition and valorization of Data.




We provide a collaborative ecosystem for a new generation of pluri-disciplinary engineers who are eager to broaden their understanding of challenges across the data flow.




As a Solver in Data Science at Exsolvæ, you will be responsible for providing data-driven solutions to our clients' challenges in industries such as banking, insurance, and pharmaceutical manufacturing, ...




Job Responsibilities:




Analyzing complex data sets and extracting insights to inform decision making using software such as Python, R, and SQL.
Designing and implementing data-driven solutions using statistical and machine learning techniques.
Collaborating with clients to understand their needs and challenges, and providing recommendations.
Communicating findings and recommendations to clients in a clear and concise manner.
Continuously learning and staying up-to-date with the latest developments in the field of Data Science.
Mentoring junior team members and contributing to the development of the Data Science team.







Key Requirements:




A Master's or PhD in Data Science, Computer Science, or a related field.
Strong experience in data analysis and machine learning techniques.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Proactive and able to work independently as well as part of a team.
A strong desire to learn and stay up-to-date with the latest developments in Data Science.
Fluent in English (Mandatory).
Fluency in Flemish and/or French (Mandatory).







Additional Preferred Qualifications:




Programming languages such as Python, R, and SQL.
Data visualization tools such as Tableau and Matplotlib.
Hands on experience with Large Language Models and associated frameworks (OpenAI, Llamas, Langchain, ...)
Machine learning libraries and frameworks such as scikit-learn, TensorFlow, and PyTorch.
Cloud computing platforms such as AWS, Google Cloud, and Azure.
Data storage and management systems such as Hadoop, Spark, and NoSQL databases.
Collaboration and project management tools such as Jupyter and GitHub.







Advantages of the Position:




Long Term Contract (CDI)
The opportunity to work on a wide range of challenging and diverse projects in industries such as banking, insurance, and pharmaceutical manufacturing.
A collaborative and supportive work environment.
Continuous learning and professional development opportunities.
Attractive salary and benefits package.
The chance to be part of a meaningful project from the start.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer F/M/X
Description:
We are currently seeking a Machine Learning Engineer to join our dynamic team at Amaris Consulting, located in Belgium. This role is a unique opportunity for those passionate about AI and machine learning, looking to apply their skills in a challenging yet rewarding environment.

🔥Your Responsibilities:

Developing machine learning models from scratch and improving existing ones
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and provide appropriate solutions.
Data preprocessing including data cleaning, normalization, and transformation.
Evaluating model performance using suitable metrics and validation techniques
Maintaining clear documentation of the development process for future reference and audits
Staying updated with the latest trends in machine learning algorithms, tools, industry best practices
Promoting knowledge sharing within the team through presentations or workshops on new findings or technologies related to ML/AI
Troubleshooting any issues that arise during the development or deployment of ML models

🎯 Your Profile:

The ideal candidate is a recent graduate who has a strong passion for artificial intelligence (AI) & machine learning (ML). You should be eager to learn new things continuously while being able to work effectively as part of a diverse team.

A bachelor’s degree in computer science/engineering/mathematics or related field is required; a masters degree is advantageous.
Familiarity with Python programming language along with libraries such as TensorFlow/Keras/PyTorch used in ML applications.
An understanding of various Machine Learning algorithms like Regression Models, Decision Trees etc., along with their real-world advantages/drawbacks.
Good understanding of data structures, data modeling and software architecture
An analytical mindset with problem-solving skills.
Ability to troubleshoot complex software issues
Excellent communication skills to effectively collaborate with team members and stakeholders
Able to work independently as well as in a team environment.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English and French or Dutch.
Minimum 1 to 7 years of experience.




🚀 Advantages:

An international learning environment
Extensive training and certifications.
A R&D laboratory where you can develop your skills on innovative projects.
The opportunity to bring new ideas to develop a thriving business.
Individual coaching and mentoring, as well as the chance to learn from experts for your professional and personal growth.
An attractive, tailor-made, and evolving career path.

💡 We are an independent company that values:

Agility: thrive in a flexible, dynamic, and stimulating environment.
International scope: enjoy daily international exchanges and numerous mobility opportunities in over 60 countries.
Intrapreneurship: engage in related topics or develop your own Business Unit.
Attentive management: with a limited number of consultants, your manager will adapt to your profile and support you throughout your professional journey.




Amaris Consulting is proud to be an equal-opportunity workplace. We are committed to promoting diversity within the workforce and creating an inclusive working environment. For this purpose, we welcome applications from all qualified candidates regardless of gender, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, beliefs, age, marital status, disability, or other characteristics.

Title: Data Scientist/Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
APPLICATION BY EMAIL according to the application rules hereunder (not via LinkedIn). Please attach all the documents asked.




About the project

On the battlefield, injured soldiers can face significant delays in medical treatment or evacuation due to ongoing hostilities and treacherous terrain. Traditional methods of casualty care rely on limited information and may put medics at unnecessary risk: medics often lack a comprehensive picture of the battlefield, hindering their ability to locate and prioritise casualties while minimising exposure to threats. The TaMaCare project emerges from this critical observation, aiming to revolutionise battlefield casualty care by creating a real-time digital twin of the frontline. More precisely, we aim to improve response times and decision-making in critical situations. The proposed digital twin aims to provide medics with a clear view of the battlefield, encompassing the location of injured soldiers, their vital signs, and any structures or potential dangers present in the vicinity.




Expected results

The impact of TaMaCare on battlefield casualty care is multifaceted and far-reaching:

Faster and better decision making: TaMaCare will create a digital twin of the battlefield for use by the rear echelon and decision makers, allowing faster response times and improved decision-making. The digital twin will provide real-time information of the environment, casualty location and their health status, allowing medics to make informed decisions about treatment priorities and evacuation routes, considering factors like urgency, (environmental) hazards, and resource availability. The detailed 3D map, including casualties and threats, can also be used to plan optimal evacuation routes, taking into account terrain, obstacles, and the physical condition of casualties.
Reduced risk for soldiers and medics: The digital twin will be created using unmanned systems, i.e. without putting soldiers in harm’s way. By providing a clear picture of potential threats, TaMaCare allows medics to navigate the battlefield with greater awareness and minimise their exposure to danger.
Post-action analysis: The digital twin allows for an after action analysis of the decision and actions that were made, allowing to draw lessons for future interventions.

The benefits of TaMaCare extend beyond immediate casualty care and contribute to a broader strengthening of defence capabilities. In fact, the project fosters advancements in 3D mapping, threat detection/assessment through image processing, and Ultra-Wide Band (UWB) localization networks. These advancements have broader applications for military and civilian operations and for intelligence gathering: planning for offensive/defensive operations, re-assessment of the geometrical environment after man-made or natural calamities, improved navigation of unmanned vehicles, removal of UXO/IED (Unexploded Ordnance/Improvised Explosive Devices), etc.




Your role

The research in TaMaCare will be performed by a Belgian consortium. The role of the researcher hired for this job offer will focus on the development of AI models and ML techniques to facilitate, automate and simplify detection of threats on the battlefield using electromagnetic (panchromatic, multispectral or hyperspectral) sensors in the visible and infrared spectrum based on their spatial or spatio-spectral signature. This knowledge will also be applied to other projects within RMA with similar needs.




Required skills

Technical skills

The applicant shall have a Master Degree in Engineering Science, Applied Sciences, Civil Engineering, Physics, Computer Science or Mathematics.

Training or experience in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning and/or Deep Learning is essential;
Experience in programming with C++ or Python is essential;
Experience with OpenCV, PyTorch or Tensorflow is highly recommended;
Experience with Computer Vision is highly recommended;
Experience with the Robotic Operating System (ROS) or Linux is recommended;
Training or experience in multi- or hyperspectral imaging or other EO technologies is an added value;
Training or experience in processing of large scale data is an added value;
Training or experience in agile workflow methodologies is an added value;
Training or experience in applied, collaborative research is an added value;

Other skills

The applicant shall have very good knowledge of English (oral / written).
The applicant shall preferably have knowledge of either French or Dutch and a minimum knowledge of the other language in order to allow collaboration with peers. This will be tested during the selection process.

Specific requirements

Interest in starting a PhD is an added value.
The researcher may be exposed to classified information and will therefore have to obtain the required security clearance. The candidate must consent with the background check required to obtain this clearance, which will be executed by the Belgian Defence.
A driver’s licence valid in Belgium is an added value.
Working for the Patrimony requires living in Belgium for the duration of the study.




Application

You will be working in a military environment. That is why everyone is expected to undergo a security verification. A passport issued by a country that is both member of the EU and NATO is required. Please add to your application the filled-out document. The form can be downloaded from:

http://www.rma.ac.be/nl/aanvraag-veiligheidsverificatie (Dutch) or

https://rma.ac.be/sites/default/files/2021-03/Demande%20d%27Avis%20de%20S%C3%A9curit%C3%A9_F.pdf (French).

There is unfortunately no English version of this document.

Please send your complete application by e-mail. Incomplete applications will not be considered. We do not accept applications via LinkedIn. Send ALL of the following elements to Prof Dr ir Rob HAELTERMAN (rob.haelterman@mil.be), ir Charles HAMESSE (charles.hamesse@mil.be) and Dr ir Helena BRUYNINCKX (erm-deao-rswo@mil.be):

a CV and a motivational letter
a scan of your ID card (both sides);
the filled-out security document (Please do not forget to sign & add the denomination “GELEZEN EN GOEDGEKEURD” (Dutch) or “LU ET APPROUVE” (French))
your relevant publications (a link to an online open access repository is acceptable)

Please mention clearly the reference of the project in the subject line of your mail: “TaMaCare”.

(Mails received without this reference or applications sent other than by email to all the above addresses will not be considered. Applications that do not contain all the above elements will also not be considered.)

Application deadline: 16th of August 2024

The interviews will take place at the Royal Military Academy, Hobbemastraat 8, 1000 Brussels. In specific cases, on-line interviews can take place. The date and time of the interview will be communicated to the preselected candidates.




Contract

Date of selection: September 26th 2024
Start of contract: December 1st 2024.
This contract depends on the acceptance of a study proposal. Acceptance will only be known on September 25th. This means that the job offer is currently provisional until that date.
Status: Full-time employment (38 hours / week) based on an open-ended contract with the Patrimony of the Royal Military Academy (you will not be a civil servant).
To be very clear: your contract will be open-ended, but the financing of the contract will be tied to a project that ends on November 30th 2027. The financing of your contract beyond that period is therefore not 100% guaranteed. However, the chance that we will be able to offer a follow-up project beyond that date is high.
Wage scale: class A1 (holder of a Master's Degree in Science, doctor’s degree in the same area of expertise); class A2 (holder of an Ir degree or equivalent Master's degree in Engineering Sciences, doctor’s degree in the same area of expertise). RMA-Patrimony applies a merit-based research career track, allowing researchers to advance in wage scale based upon annual evaluations.
Holiday pay.

Extra-legal benefits

Possibility to benefit from a bilingualism allowance (Dutch/French) following a SELOR test;
End-of-year bonus;
Free DKV hospitalization insurance. Possibility of additional affiliation for one or more persons living under the same roof: spouse, child(ren) (50% of the price per additional member);
Bike allowance / Free public transport (home-work commute);
Free access to campus sports facilities outside working hours;
On-campus restaurant and cafeteria with democratic prices (discount on the daily menu);
Meal vouchers (6€/day)
Flexible working hours within the 38-hour week + Teleworking possible with allowance;
Holidays o 29 days holiday / year from the 1st year of contract (then from 45 years: +1 day holiday every 5 years) o + 1 week OFF every year between Christmas and New year’s Eve
Advantages and interesting offers thanks to the Benefits@work card (discounts, vouchers...);
Entitlement to services offered by the ‘Office Central d'Action Sociale et Culturelle de la Défense’ (OCASC): among others holiday centres, discount on travel organised by the tour operator...;
Possibility of benefiting from the nursery funded by Belgian Defence (subject to availability).




Workplace

Royal Military Academy, Avenue de la Renaissance 30, 1000 Brussels;
Occasional travels abroad for scientific conferences, etc.

Points of contact

Concerning the research project: to Prof Dr ir Rob HAELTERMAN (rob.haelterman@mil.be )
Concerning the recruitment modalities: Dr ir Helena Bruyninckx (erm-deao-rswo@mil.be)
For more information about the Royal Military Academy, see http://www.rma.ac.be
