Title: Machine Learning Software Engineer
Description:
Machine Learning Software Engineer




Distributed ML Training




Location: Fully Remote

Type: Full-time




Join an innovative Series A Deep Tech company at the forefront of AI and blockchain technology! Backed by top investors with over $50 million in funding, our client is a team of 20 industry experts, looking to grow to 35. They are leveraging blockchain to provide globally accessible computing resources for AI platforms and are seeking world-class engineers to accelerate AI progress. This is a fully remote role offering a high level of autonomy.




Responsibilities:




ML Orchestration System Design: Develop systems for orchestrating ML execution across decentralized and heterogeneous infrastructure.
Performance Optimization: Profile and optimize training algorithms continually.
Implement Novel Research: Build new mechanisms and algorithms to solve unprecedented problems.
Engineering Support: Collaborate on broader ML issues, such as reproducible training.
Technical Writing and Engagement: Contribute to technical reports and papers, and engage with the community.




Minimum Requirements:




Distributed Foundation Model Training: Experience designing or working with training systems on large clusters.
Networking Proficiency: Understanding and troubleshooting experience with IP, TCP, UDP, HTTP, and communication backends like NCCL, GLOO, and MPI.
Open Source Contributions: Experience with large open-source codebases as a maintainer or trusted contributor.
Rust Enthusiasm: Willingness to learn Rust to work across the codebase.
Computer Science Background: Solid understanding of computational complexity and broad knowledge of algorithms and data structures.
Self-motivation and Communication: Highly self-motivated with excellent verbal and written communication skills.
Applied Research Comfort: Comfortable working in a high-autonomy, unpredictable applied research environment.




Bonus Skills:




Rust Expertise: Strong experience with systems programming in Rust, understanding lifetimes, and the purpose of Pin.
Research Experience: Published research in distributed systems or ML domains.
Blockchain Knowledge: Understanding of blockchain fundamentals.







Be part of a team dedicated to democratizing AI, where you can leverage your expertise in distributed ML training, networking, and open-source contributions to make a significant impact. Embrace autonomy, continuous learning, and the drive to push innovative solutions in a highly collaborative and flexible environment.




Apply now to join this cutting-edge team and contribute to the future of AI!

Type: Full-time


Join an innovative Series A Deep Tech company at the forefront of AI and blockchain technology! Backed by top investors with over $50 million in funding, our client is a team of 20 industry experts, looking to grow to 35. They are leveraging blockchain to provide globally accessible computing resources for AI platforms and are seeking world-class engineers to accelerate AI progress. This is a fully remote role offering a high level of autonomy.


Responsibilities:


  • ML Orchestration System Design: Develop systems for orchestrating ML execution across decentralized and heterogeneous infrastructure.
  • Performance Optimization: Profile and optimize training algorithms continually.
  • Implement Novel Research: Build new mechanisms and algorithms to solve unprecedented problems.
  • Engineering Support: Collaborate on broader ML issues, such as reproducible training.
  • Technical Writing and Engagement: Contribute to technical reports and papers, and engage with the community.


Minimum Requirements:


  • Distributed Foundation Model Training: Experience designing or working with training systems on large clusters.
  • Networking Proficiency: Understanding and troubleshooting experience with IP, TCP, UDP, HTTP, and communication backends like NCCL, GLOO, and MPI.
  • Open Source Contributions: Experience with large open-source codebases as a maintainer or trusted contributor.
  • Rust Enthusiasm: Willingness to learn Rust to work across the codebase.
  • Computer Science Background: Solid understanding of computational complexity and broad knowledge of algorithms and data structures.
  • Self-motivation and Communication: Highly self-motivated with excellent verbal and written communication skills.
  • Applied Research Comfort: Comfortable working in a high-autonomy, unpredictable applied research environment.


Bonus Skills:


  • Rust Expertise: Strong experience with systems programming in Rust, understanding lifetimes, and the purpose of Pin.
  • Research Experience: Published research in distributed systems or ML domains.
  • Blockchain Knowledge: Understanding of blockchain fundamentals.



Be part of a team dedicated to democratizing AI, where you can leverage your expertise in distributed ML training, networking, and open-source contributions to make a significant impact. Embrace autonomy, continuous learning, and the drive to push innovative solutions in a highly collaborative and flexible environment.


Apply now to join this cutting-edge team and contribute to the future of AI!

Title: MLops Engineer (Data Science)
Description:
We are looking for an engineering profile with a data science background and a focus on MLops and Azure cloud environment to join our team.

We're building our cloud environment from the ground up and need new talent to join our team and help us scale to 100+ projects. Azure machine learning is a central component in the cloud architecture. Additionally, we want to improve our on-premises environment, which won’t disappear anytime soon, and blend some azure components in it.

Next to the MLops role, you'll have the opportunity to work on data science use cases, this entails you will help business define and scope the problem, pick the right machine learning solution and technology as well as ensure implementation, integration and deployment of your solution to production.

If you're someone who loves to think about architecture, set it up, and then figure out how to break it, we want to hear from you!

Responsibilities


Automating everything related to the ML lifecycle to ensure efficiency and scalability.
Using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) practices, such as Bicep, to manage and provision resources through code.
Implementing best practices for continuous integration and delivery (CI/CD) pipelines, ensuring that ML models are reliably deployed to production environments.
Collaborate with data scientists to deploy, monitor, and troubleshoot machine learning models and applications using Azure Machine Learning, Azure devops and Azure AI Services.
Challenge our existing security and reinforce our defenses.



Profile


Master's degree in computer science, data science, engineering, or related field.
At least 2 years of experience in data engineering, data science, or related roles.
Proficient in Python.
Experience with Azure cloud services and tools, notably azure machine learning and azure devops.
Experience with mlops concepts and frameworks.
Knowledge on containerized deployment of ML products – e.g. docker, podman, Kubernetes.
Excellent communication, collaboration, and problem-solving skills.
Fluent in English is a must. Dutch and/or French is considered as a plus.



Show more

Title: Data Analyst / Scientist (M/F/X)
HTML:
Société

parking.brussels est une jeune agence gouvernementale dynamique, en pleine croissance. Notre devise « mieux se garer pour mieux bouger », résume notre vision ambitieuse pour améliorer la mobilité. Notre objectif ? Harmoniser les règles de stationnement dans toute la Région bruxelloise, en collaboration avec les 19 communes. Dans cette perspective, et en vue d’œuvrer à une ville plus agréable et durable, nous sommes régulièrement en quête de nouveaux collaborateurs.

Fonction

Statut : Contractuel

Contrat : A durée indéterminée

Nombre de postes : 2

Localisation : Bruxelles

Niveau d’études : Ingénieur / Master (enseignement supérieur de type long)

Société : Agence du stationnement de la Région Bruxelles-Capitale

Vous intégrez parking.brussels en tant que Data Analyst / Scientist, dans l’optique d’y collaborer à la maîtrise et la gouvernance des données, et d’accompagner l’évolution digitale de l’entreprise, au sein d’un nouveau département dédié au management de la data. Au-delà de vos activités propres, vous aurez ainsi l’opportunité d’accompagner l’Agence dans sa transition digitale.

Responsabilites & Tâches (liste Non Exhaustives)

Sous la responsabilité du Data Manager, et en collaboration avec les services de support (IT et Technologie) et les départements métier (On-street, Off-street, Finances …) :

  • Vous appréhendez les différents aspects relatifs aux données générées ou produites par l’entreprise (localisation, accès, formats, structures et contenus) ;
  • Vous êtes chargé de l’analyse de ces données, dont vous procédez au traitement (extraction, intégration, tests, contrôles qualité, consolidation, enrichissement ...) et à la restitution statistique (tableaux, graphiques, rapports dynamiques, cartographies) destinée à en faciliter la compréhension et l’utilisation ;
  • Au-delà de ces aspects d’analyse, vous exploitez toutes données disponibles sous la forme d’indicateurs pertinents eu égard aux besoins et impératifs de parking.brussels en matière de gouvernance, politique interne / externe, reporting, études et suivi opérationnel / contractuel ;
  • Vous participez dans ce cadre à la mise en place des processus et outils permettant l’importation / centralisation des données (au sein d’une solution de type Data Warehouse) ainsi que leur restitution dynamique (dashboard), en vue de systématiser et automatiser tant leur exploitation que leur visualisation et diffusion ;
  • Vous vous tenez informé des évolutions techniques relatives à ces processus et outils, et êtes en mesure de formuler des propositions à cet égard ;
  • Sur base de vos activités et travaux, vous faites des recommandations quant à l’amélioration des processus opérationnels et des positionnements stratégiques de l’entreprise ;
  • Vous documentez rigoureusement l’ensemble des étapes et procédures impliquées dans vos travaux ;
  • Vous prenez en charge les procédures de marchés publics associées à vos domaines d'intervention et votre champ d'expertise.

Profil

FORMATION

Vous êtes titulaire d’un Master (en data science, sciences exactes, statistique ou informatique).

COMPÉTENCES TECHNIQUES

  • Vous disposez d’une expertise, idéalement via une expérience professionnelle pertinente, dans l’intégration, le traitement et l’analyse de sources de données corrélées, multiples et hétérogènes (y compris de séries temporelles et de données géospatiales) ;
  • Vous avez une bonne maîtrise des méthodes et principes d’analyses statistiques, et disposez d’une connaissance des outils de reporting BI ;
  • Vous disposez du bagage informatique et technique suffisant pour la bonne exécution des tâches incombant à la fonction, et démontrez d’une expérience pratique associée à ce bagage (une expérience préalable avec le langage Python, et ses librairies d’analyse et de visualisation est recommandée) ;
  • De la manière générale, vous êtes conscient de la diversité des domaines de la Data Science et du Big Data, ainsi que des implications associées au développement d’un projet tel que le MaaS ;
  • Vous avez une connaissance du GIS, idéalement d’un logiciel en accès libre, ou êtes prêt à vous former en la matière ;
  • Vous justifiez d’une approche scientifique et rigoureuse de votre travail, ainsi que de facultés analytiques ;
  • Vous disposez de qualités rédactionnelles ;
  • Une expertise dans le domaine du stationnement ou de la mobilité, en particulier acquise en Région de Bruxelles-Capitale, ou un certificat de conseiller en mobilité (type CEMA) sont des atouts ;
  • Vous avez une bonne connaissance de la Région de Bruxelles-Capitale, en ce compris de son contexte institutionnel, et des politiques qui y sont menées en matière de stationnement et de mobilité ;
  • Vous êtes capable de rédiger un cahier des charges et de mener une procédure de marché public ;
  • Vous avez au minimum une connaissance passive de l’autre langue nationale (Fr ou NL), ainsi que de l’anglais.

COMPÉTENCES COMPORTEMENTALES

  • Être organisé.e et planifier son travail en vue de la concrétisation des objectifs fixés ;
  • Savoir travailler en autonomie et prendre des initiatives tout en cultivant l’esprit d’équipe et de collaboration ;
  • Disposer d’aptitudes analytiques et de logique, ainsi que d’une approche scientifique et d’un sens critique ;
  • Intégrer, traiter et synthétiser l’information ;
  • Faire preuve de pédagogie, conseiller, soutenir et savoir argumenter ;
  • Être à l’écoute et savoir s’adapter ;
  • S’auto-développer.

Offre

Vous serez engagé en qualité d’Attaché (A101) avec le barème de traitement correspondant.

AVANTAGES

  • Une fonction stratégique dans une jeune institution publique, en pleine évolution, qui valorise votre implication ;
  • Un équilibre harmonieux entre travail et vie privée grâce à un horaire flexible dans la prestation des 38h hebdomadaires et aux possibilités de télétravail ;
  • Chèques-repas d'une valeur de 8 euros par jour de prestation ;
  • Un capital congé attrayant (35 jours et fermeture de fin d’année) ;
  • Gratuité des transports en commun pour le trajet domicile-travail sur Bruxelles et en dehors de Bruxelles ;
  • Assurance hospitalisation pour vous et les membres de votre ménage (conjoint et enfants);
  • Une indemnité pour le télétravail de 50 euros net par mois ;
  • Prime de fin d’année ;
  • Primes pour divers évènements (mariage, naissance, Saint-Nicolas, etc.) ;
  • Chèques-cadeau (Noël et anniversaires) ;
  • Possibilité de recevoir une prime pour les déplacements en vélo ;
  • Possibilité de bénéficier d’une prime de bilinguisme ;
  • Nombreuses possibilités de formations (à suivre durant les heures de travail) ;
  • PC et GSM de société avec abonnement téléphonique ;

LA PROCÉDURE DE SÉLECTION

Vous êtes convaincu.e d'avoir le profil adéquat pour cette fonction ? Téléchargez votre CV et votre lettre de motivation en cliquant sur « postuler maintenant ». Vous recevrez ensuite un e-mail de confirmation de votre candidature.

Les candidat.e.s retenu.e.s seront invité.e.s à participer à la procédure de sélection au sein de l’Agence du stationnement de la Région Bruxelles-Capitale.

En tant que personne présentant un handicap, un trouble ou une maladie, vous pouvez demander des aménagements raisonnables de la procédure de sélection. Vous devez mentionner ceci au moment de l’envoi de votre C.V.

Date limite pour le dépôt de la candidature : 01/09/2024

Title: Artificial Intelligence Consultant
Description:
Fujitsu is looking for a Artificial Intelligence Consultant to work on a project within the EU Institutions, in Brussels. ON-SITE




Your Profile:

Good knowledge of natural language processing systems lifecycle and agile software development methodologies.
Good knowledge of analysis/modeling tools and techniques (use case diagram, state diagram, entity relationship model, interaction diagrams, etc.).
Good knowledge of BPMN or UML or other equivalent tools.
Good knowledge of Wiki and collaborative sites.
Knowledge of software development methodologies (e.g., RUP, Agile).
Excellent knowledge of Data Analytics techniques and tools.
Experience in Machine Learning and Natural Language Processing.
Experience with languages like R, Python, PERL.
Good knowledge of business intelligence tools (Tableau, Qlik, SAS, SAP, GoodData…).
Expertise in the ETL processes and tools (SAS, Talend Open Studio…).
Good knowledge of SQL tooling (NoSQL DB, MongoDB, Hadoop, SQL).




Languages: English




Location: Brussels, Belgium




Contract: Freelance or Permanent Contract

Title: (Gen) AI and Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
As Stephen Few states: “We are overwhelmed by information, not because there is too much, but because we haven't learned how to tame it.” Capgemini Insights & Data is looking for people who tame data in such a way that the most complex data can be easily interpreted.

We are looking for a (GEN) AI and Machine Learning Engineer to help our clients in their digital transformations.

Key tasks & activities


Use ML and Generative AI tools and other technologies to design, evangelize, and implement state-of-the-art solutions for never-before-solved problems.
Define and implement best practices for building, testing, and deploying scalable AI solutions, with a focus on generative models and LLM.
Drive successful business outcomes for educating, training, designing and building cloud hosted Generative AI solutions
Interact with customers directly to understand the business problem, help and aid them in implementation of their ML ecosystem
Educate customers on the value proposition of GenAI and showcase the art of possible.
Participate in deep architectural discussions and design exercises to create solutions while ensuring solutions are designed for successful deployment in the cloud.
Stay at the forefront of AI technological advancements, especially in Generative AI and LLM, and assess their applicability to our business needs.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including data scientists, AI/ML & data engineers, and functional SMEs, to ensure seamless integration and alignment of AI solutions with business objectives. influence the technical viability of the architecture of AI projects, ensuring optimal performance, scalability, and integration.
Develop Solutions to ensure robust and secure data pipelines and infrastructure to support AI model training and deployment.
Lead the evaluation of new AI tools, frameworks, and methodologies, advocating for the adoption of technologies that align with our strategic goals.



Knowledge & Experience


Experience in leveraging artificial intelligence and machine learning technologies to optimize and transform various aspects of our business operations.
Minimum of 4 years of experience in designing and building AI solutions, with a strong focus on end-to-end automation.
Proven expertise in machine learning techniques, deep learning frameworks, image processing and AI-related technologies including Generative AI.
Experience with one of the cloud platforms, preferably Azure
Experience with Python or PySpark.
Experience in using Data Science Platforms
Experience using the latest Data Science platforms (e.g. Databricks, Dataiku, AzureML, SageMaker ) and frameworks (e.g. Tensorflow, PyTorch, MXNet, scikit-learn )
Good understanding of software architecture patterns & application development.
Familiarity with DevOps,DataOps,MLOps, LLMOps principles including code repository, code management, CI/CD and AI-related automation.
Strong communication skills for both presenting work to clients, disseminating complex information in an easy-to-understand form on a day-to-day basis, and managing stakeholders.
Native speaker in Dutch or French with professional working proficiency in English.



#GetTheFutureYouWant

At Capgemini, we believe in diversity, equal opportunities, and a workplace where everyone feels valued. We take good care of people and help them make progress by assigning challenging projects and providing ample opportunities for personal growth and learning. We are looking for experienced professionals ready for their next career move.

You will join the I&D team, an ambitious, collaborative, supportive environment—problem-solvers with a strong focus on exchanging best practices to deliver exceptional results with Data science. Here, the knowledge of each team member and their own expertise is valuable to enable effective decision-making, proactive planning, and smooth project execution.

In return, we offer an attractive salary with fringe benefits:


A hybrid or electric company car (or mobility budget)
Meal & eco vouchers
Group & health insurance
Flexible work hours & the opportunity to work from home (70% of the time)
32 vacation days & 45 workcation days (to work abroad)
Intensive training and certification at all levels to keep you up to date with the latest trends & technologies



Apply now! We'd love to hear from you.

For more information: contact liz.nzimbula@capgemini.com or visit www.capgemini.com
Show more

Title: Medior/Senior Data Scientist – (Open to freelancers and employees)
Description:
The team, position & mission:




Orange Business Digital Services has been selected to support the Customer Value Management program for a major telecom operator. Our dedicated team includes business analysts, data visualization experts, and customer engagement experts, data scientists…

We are currently looking to fill an open position for a data scientist.







Your key areas of responsibility as a Data Scientist:




Contribute to the development and optimization of models and features related to Customers Value.
Leverage your expertise to seamlessly integrate with the customer's team, adapting swiftly to their well-established MLOps setup, which utilizes frameworks in Vertex AI.
Working autonomously to assist in delivering the backlog efficiently and effectively.




As an ideal candidate you have:




An extensive experience in both supervised and unsupervised machine learning and trained large scale classification models that were then pushed in production and industrialized in a professional environment
An advanced level in SQL
An advanced level in python and ML-specific libraries of python
An advanced ML theoretical background
Any knowledge of GCP (including BigQuery and Vertex AI) is a plus




What we offer you:




Hybrid ways of working with access to our modern & collaborative offices in Brussels
We may work with tomorrow’s technology, but at our core we are a people-oriented organization and we are proud to have our Great Place to Work certification
An open and inclusive culture, that enables us to reach our full potential
A community of experts - as Digital Natives, we put innovation at the heart of our expertise
Read more about the benefits we offer here




About Orange Business:




Orange Business is a leading network and digital integrator company with offices in 65 countries worldwide, and part of the Orange Group.

In Europe the business line consists of approximately 1500 people distributed across 9 countries. We are digital natives, with innovation at the core of our business, which makes us a reliable partner close to our customers. Our joint mission is to help innovate, drive and lead them in their digital transformation challenges and business strategies in key digital domains, including Cloud, Customer Experience, Digital Workspace and Data & AI. As an agile and fast-moving digital business partner, the business line offers trusted end-to-end solutions and products that help businesses in a wide range of industries in the private and public sector transform their operations, enhance customer experience, and drive growth.




Show more

  • Hybrid ways of working with access to our modern & collaborative offices in Brussels
  • We may work with tomorrow’s technology, but at our core we are a people-oriented organization and we are proud to have our Great Place to Work certification
  • An open and inclusive culture, that enables us to reach our full potential
  • A community of experts - as Digital Natives, we put innovation at the heart of our expertise
  • Read more about the benefits we offer here


About Orange Business:


Orange Business is a leading network and digital integrator company with offices in 65 countries worldwide, and part of the Orange Group.

In Europe the business line consists of approximately 1500 people distributed across 9 countries. We are digital natives, with innovation at the core of our business, which makes us a reliable partner close to our customers. Our joint mission is to help innovate, drive and lead them in their digital transformation challenges and business strategies in key digital domains, including Cloud, Customer Experience, Digital Workspace and Data & AI. As an agile and fast-moving digital business partner, the business line offers trusted end-to-end solutions and products that help businesses in a wide range of industries in the private and public sector transform their operations, enhance customer experience, and drive growth.

Title: Python Software Engineer
Description:
Permanent position only

WHAT CREAM IS ALL ABOUT?

We could be a Cream Factory, a cooking blog or even a detective agency…but in reality, we are a consulting company in Business & Technology active in large organizations and industry leaders in Banking, Insurance, Telecom, Energy, Pharmaceutical & Transport.




CREAM’S SPECIAL RECIPE:

1/3 of Personal development
1/3 of Collective Intelligence
1/3 of Intrapreneurship




And Bonus ingredient: … Some passionate colleagues




WHAT IS A PYTHON SOFTWARE ENGINEER AT CREAM?

As a Python Software Engineer, embrace your role and work with multidisciplinary teams on challenging projects as:

Reporting tools (finance…)
Web applications
Power calculation
Cloud migrations…




YOUR TASKS :

You define technical specifications
You develop and test new innovative tools
You maintain and support Python libraries with other developers
You coach users through ad-hoc training sessions and code reviews
You provide technological watch to keep up to date on state-of-the-art technologies




HOW DO WE IMAGINE OUR FUTURE CONSULTANT?

You love designing, developing, testing and maintaining applications
You hold a Master’s Degree (civil engineer, software engineering…)
You are used to work with Python (Pandas, Numpy…) and C#
You are fluent in French and English; a good knowledge of Dutch is an asset

Bonus :

You have knowledge of technologies among Angular, Kubernetes, Dockers, Azure, Git…
You have IT Infrastructure knowledge

WHY SHOULD YOU TASTE THE LIME FLAVOUR?




A broad diversity of career options: you’re not stuck in a box
You evolve in a learning environment where you can challenge your knowledge with your colleagues
You grow in a company that is at the leading edge of technology
You have the opportunity to bring new ideas to develop a thriving company
We have values we share, live with, experiment every day




We just hire great people and give them the playing field to become awesome!

Title: Data Analyst / Scientist (M/F/X)
HTML:
Société

parking.brussels est une jeune agence gouvernementale dynamique, en pleine croissance. Notre devise « mieux se garer pour mieux bouger », résume notre vision ambitieuse pour améliorer la mobilité. Notre objectif ? Harmoniser les règles de stationnement dans toute la Région bruxelloise, en collaboration avec les 19 communes. Dans cette perspective, et en vue d’œuvrer à une ville plus agréable et durable, nous sommes régulièrement en quête de nouveaux collaborateurs.

Fonction

Statut : Contractuel

Contrat : A durée indéterminée

Nombre de postes : 2

Localisation : Bruxelles

Niveau d’études : Ingénieur / Master (enseignement supérieur de type long)

Société : Agence du stationnement de la Région Bruxelles-Capitale

Vous intégrez parking.brussels en tant que Data Analyst / Scientist, dans l’optique d’y collaborer à la maîtrise et la gouvernance des données, et d’accompagner l’évolution digitale de l’entreprise, au sein d’un nouveau département dédié au management de la data. Au-delà de vos activités propres, vous aurez ainsi l’opportunité d’accompagner l’Agence dans sa transition digitale.

Responsabilites & Tâches (liste Non Exhaustives)

Sous la responsabilité du Data Manager, et en collaboration avec les services de support (IT et Technologie) et les départements métier (On-street, Off-street, Finances …) :

  • Vous appréhendez les différents aspects relatifs aux données générées ou produites par l’entreprise (localisation, accès, formats, structures et contenus) ;
  • Vous êtes chargé de l’analyse de ces données, dont vous procédez au traitement (extraction, intégration, tests, contrôles qualité, consolidation, enrichissement ...) et à la restitution statistique (tableaux, graphiques, rapports dynamiques, cartographies) destinée à en faciliter la compréhension et l’utilisation ;
  • Au-delà de ces aspects d’analyse, vous exploitez toutes données disponibles sous la forme d’indicateurs pertinents eu égard aux besoins et impératifs de parking.brussels en matière de gouvernance, politique interne / externe, reporting, études et suivi opérationnel / contractuel ;
  • Vous participez dans ce cadre à la mise en place des processus et outils permettant l’importation / centralisation des données (au sein d’une solution de type Data Warehouse) ainsi que leur restitution dynamique (dashboard), en vue de systématiser et automatiser tant leur exploitation que leur visualisation et diffusion ;
  • Vous vous tenez informé des évolutions techniques relatives à ces processus et outils, et êtes en mesure de formuler des propositions à cet égard ;
  • Sur base de vos activités et travaux, vous faites des recommandations quant à l’amélioration des processus opérationnels et des positionnements stratégiques de l’entreprise ;
  • Vous documentez rigoureusement l’ensemble des étapes et procédures impliquées dans vos travaux ;
  • Vous prenez en charge les procédures de marchés publics associées à vos domaines d'intervention et votre champ d'expertise.

Profil

FORMATION

Vous êtes titulaire d’un Master (en data science, sciences exactes, statistique ou informatique).

COMPÉTENCES TECHNIQUES

  • Vous disposez d’une expertise, idéalement via une expérience professionnelle pertinente, dans l’intégration, le traitement et l’analyse de sources de données corrélées, multiples et hétérogènes (y compris de séries temporelles et de données géospatiales) ;
  • Vous avez une bonne maîtrise des méthodes et principes d’analyses statistiques, et disposez d’une connaissance des outils de reporting BI ;
  • Vous disposez du bagage informatique et technique suffisant pour la bonne exécution des tâches incombant à la fonction, et démontrez d’une expérience pratique associée à ce bagage (une expérience préalable avec le langage Python, et ses librairies d’analyse et de visualisation est recommandée) ;
  • De la manière générale, vous êtes conscient de la diversité des domaines de la Data Science et du Big Data, ainsi que des implications associées au développement d’un projet tel que le MaaS ;
  • Vous avez une connaissance du GIS, idéalement d’un logiciel en accès libre, ou êtes prêt à vous former en la matière ;
  • Vous justifiez d’une approche scientifique et rigoureuse de votre travail, ainsi que de facultés analytiques ;
  • Vous disposez de qualités rédactionnelles ;
  • Une expertise dans le domaine du stationnement ou de la mobilité, en particulier acquise en Région de Bruxelles-Capitale, ou un certificat de conseiller en mobilité (type CEMA) sont des atouts ;
  • Vous avez une bonne connaissance de la Région de Bruxelles-Capitale, en ce compris de son contexte institutionnel, et des politiques qui y sont menées en matière de stationnement et de mobilité ;
  • Vous êtes capable de rédiger un cahier des charges et de mener une procédure de marché public ;
  • Vous avez au minimum une connaissance passive de l’autre langue nationale (Fr ou NL), ainsi que de l’anglais.

COMPÉTENCES COMPORTEMENTALES

  • Être organisé.e et planifier son travail en vue de la concrétisation des objectifs fixés ;
  • Savoir travailler en autonomie et prendre des initiatives tout en cultivant l’esprit d’équipe et de collaboration ;
  • Disposer d’aptitudes analytiques et de logique, ainsi que d’une approche scientifique et d’un sens critique ;
  • Intégrer, traiter et synthétiser l’information ;
  • Faire preuve de pédagogie, conseiller, soutenir et savoir argumenter ;
  • Être à l’écoute et savoir s’adapter ;
  • S’auto-développer.

Offre

Vous serez engagé en qualité d’Attaché (A101) avec le barème de traitement correspondant.

AVANTAGES

  • Une fonction stratégique dans une jeune institution publique, en pleine évolution, qui valorise votre implication ;
  • Un équilibre harmonieux entre travail et vie privée grâce à un horaire flexible dans la prestation des 38h hebdomadaires et aux possibilités de télétravail ;
  • Chèques-repas d'une valeur de 8 euros par jour de prestation ;
  • Un capital congé attrayant (35 jours et fermeture de fin d’année) ;
  • Gratuité des transports en commun pour le trajet domicile-travail sur Bruxelles et en dehors de Bruxelles ;
  • Assurance hospitalisation pour vous et les membres de votre ménage (conjoint et enfants);
  • Une indemnité pour le télétravail de 50 euros net par mois ;
  • Prime de fin d’année ;
  • Primes pour divers évènements (mariage, naissance, Saint-Nicolas, etc.) ;
  • Chèques-cadeau (Noël et anniversaires) ;
  • Possibilité de recevoir une prime pour les déplacements en vélo ;
  • Possibilité de bénéficier d’une prime de bilinguisme ;
  • Nombreuses possibilités de formations (à suivre durant les heures de travail) ;
  • PC et GSM de société avec abonnement téléphonique ;

LA PROCÉDURE DE SÉLECTION

Vous êtes convaincu.e d'avoir le profil adéquat pour cette fonction ? Téléchargez votre CV et votre lettre de motivation en cliquant sur « postuler maintenant ». Vous recevrez ensuite un e-mail de confirmation de votre candidature.

Les candidat.e.s retenu.e.s seront invité.e.s à participer à la procédure de sélection au sein de l’Agence du stationnement de la Région Bruxelles-Capitale.

En tant que personne présentant un handicap, un trouble ou une maladie, vous pouvez demander des aménagements raisonnables de la procédure de sélection. Vous devez mentionner ceci au moment de l’envoi de votre C.V.

Date limite pour le dépôt de la candidature : 01/09/2024

Title: Expert Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
🤖 The Job

Dataroots specialises in crafting robust AI solutions and platforms across diverse sectors, with a keen focus on DataOps and MLOps. As an Expert Machine Learning Engineer, you'll be an integral part of our dedicated in-house team of AI specialists. Your role entails constructing and refining machine learning models that culminate in resilient, production-ready solutions aimed at optimising company processes.

You possess an unwavering passion for data, adept at unraveling its intricacies to unveil its hidden insights. With extensive experience in handling big data, you excel in developing and implementing a wide spectrum of statistical and machine learning models. Your responsibility extends to meticulously overseeing the performance of your models' output, constantly striving to experiment with novel approaches to deliver best-in-class solutions to clients. Collaboration with our data engineers and cloud architects across projects spanning various sectors is paramount, always adhering to a quality-centric, end-to-end approach. The ultimate outcome? Empowering our clients with a dependable foundation for data-driven decision-making




As a senior member, you'll play a pivotal role in fostering knowledge-sharing initiatives within the team. Through a plethora of avenues, you'll actively contribute to disseminating expertise while staying abreast of the latest advancements in the field.




🎉 What you can expect at Dataroots

Dataroots was founded in 2016 and, since its beginnings, has focused on helping its customers achieve excellence in their data-driven operations. The only way to do this sustainably is by investing in team well-being, diversity, knowledge sharing and customer experience. This quality-first focus has allowed sustained and healthy growth over the years. Join a team where you can have an impact on our growth story. Read up more on our DNA over at [https://dataroots.io/our-dna].




💪 The Skills

You bring these qualities and experiences to the job:

Mastery in Machine Learning, backed by a Master's or Doctorate in a quantitative field.
A profound understanding and strong opinions on software design principles.
Extensive industry experience, with a minimum of 4+ years in machine learning and big data.
Strong theoretical grounding and practical expertise in general machine learning and deep learning.
Excellency in both Python & SQL is a must, with additional familiarity in Scala/R.
Demonstrated proficiency in deploying ML models and expertise in MLOps.
Comprehensive understanding of cloud engineering.
Familiarity with GenAI is a big plus.
Enthusiasm for working with substantial datasets.
Pragmatic problem-solving approach.
Exceptional communication skills, capable of translating complex solutions into lucid explanations.
Thorough comprehension of the (big) data ecosystem.
Experience in the consultancy sector is a big plus.
Fluency in English. Speaking Dutch or French fluently is a big plus.
You have EU citizenship or a permanent VISA.




💰 The Offer

An attractive salary package with extralegal benefits such as a company car & fuel card or mobility budget, hospitalisation insurance, group insurance, and a high-end laptop and a smartphone.
A personal & team training budget to further your professional career.
Your innovation budget to work on cool, educational, challenging and open-source projects within your guild.
Team Buildings, team gatherings to let off steam and be part of our sports initiatives.




🇧🇪 Our main offices are in Leuven, Ghent and Utrecht 🇳🇱, with co-working spaces in Charleroi and Antwerp. These locations are always available for brainstorming sessions or team events. As a Dataroots consultant, much work can be performed remotely, but you will most likely also visit our clients on-site.




Ready for a new chapter as an Expert Machine Learning Engineer at Dataroots? Super! Apply now! 🎉

As a Dataroots consultant, much work can be performed remotely, but you will most likely also visit our clients on-site.


Ready for a new chapter as an Expert Machine Learning Engineer at Dataroots? Super! Apply now! 🎉

Title: Data Scientist Power Distribution & Substations
Description:
DE JOB

Digitalisering en automatisering zijn twee grote focuspunten van Infrabel. Ons Meteo-systeem dat elke drie minuten automatisch het niveau van de wisselverwarming berekent op basis van meteorologische gegevens en een expertsysteem, is een van de mooiste en meest innovatieve voorbeelden hiervan.

Als Specialist Data Scientist werk je mee aan het automatiseren van (diagnose)systemen , specifiek in het domein van Substations & Power Distribution, met als doel het meer en meer inzetten op predictief onderhoud, reduceren van de onderhoudslast en het optimaliseren van het energie-verbruik.

Dit Houdt Onder Andere In


Je identificeert de te monitoren of op afstand te besturen installaties. Deze situeren zich in het domein van de sterkstroom / ( vermogen)elektronica bijvoorbeeld : batterijen, schakelaars, kabelnetwerken, laders, wisselrichters, wisselverwarmingsinstallaties.
Op basis van statistieken en checklists bepaal je welke installaties het meeste problemen geven en hoe groot de kans is dat je deze problemen op voorhand kan detecteren.
Je maakt in samenwerking met de technische specialisten voorstellen aan het management over de manier waarop deze problemen kunnen gemonitord of (op afstand) gecorrigeerd worden.
Van zodra het management zijn akkoord geeft over jouw voorstellen, werk je deze ook verder uit. Je bepaalt de interfaces en laat deze communiceren met de bestaande databases/systemen om zo alle nodige data te kunnen verzamelen.
In een latere fase analyseer en correleer je data uit de verschillende bronnen. Zo ga je op zoek naar verbanden in het systeem en leg je linken tussen de data en de fysische realiteit van de assets.
Einddoel van jouw functie is het reduceren van het preventief onderhoud van de assets en gelinkt hieraan het terugdringen van het aantal incidenten. Hierdoor bouw je niet alleen mee aan de automatisatie van Infrabel maar ook aan een veiliger netwerk voor iedereen.
Enerzijds werk je samen in het team Substations & Power Distribution en anderzijds maak je deel uit van een gespecialiseerd team dataverwerving- en analyse. Ook met de collega’s ICT en meer bepaald Telecom ben je regelmatig in contact.


Het betreft een functie vang Rang 3 en Klasse 6 volgens het New Reward Plan.

JOUW PROFIEL


Je beschikt over een Masterdiploma of gelijkwaardige relevante ervaring.
Je hebt ervaring binnen of affiniteit met één of meerdere van de volgende domeinen : informatica (programmeren), telecommunicatie, automatisatie (PLC’s), data science (data modelering/ algoritmes / forecast modellen / artficiële intelligentie / geografische data / power(BI)).
Je hebt tenminste een basiskennis van databases en/of programmeren. Een basiskennis elektriciteit is een plus.
Je hebt een affiniteit met IT en kennis SQL.
Je spreekt en schrijft vloeiend in het Nederlands of Frans met minstens een basiskennis van de 2e landstaal.
Je weet jouw communicatiestijl vlot aan te passen in functie van het moment, de situatie, de persoon… en stemt hierbij jouw boodschap af op de noden, achtergrond en verwachtingen van jouw doelpubliek.
Je draagt actief bij tot het creëren van een goede teamgeest en tot het bereiken van een gezamenlijk resultaat. Hierbij ontwikkel je positieve en effectieve werkrelaties.
Je beschikt over een sterk analytisch vermogen. Je identificeert de verschillende aspecten van dagelijkse problemen en legt hierbij relevante verbanden.
Je bent inventief en een geduldige doorzetter wat vereist is om projecten te realiseren in samenwerking met interne en externe partijen.


Infrabel wil de maatschappelijke diversiteit weerspiegeld zien in haar medewerkers. Jouw talenten en enthousiasme, daar draait het om, niet om je geslacht, leeftijd, origine of beperking.

ONS AANBOD


Een boeiende en afwisselende job
Bij een stabiel bedrijf dat bijdraagt aan een duurzame mobiliteit voor de samenleving
Talrijke opleidings- en doorgroeimogelijkheden: jij bent ondernemer van je eigen carrière
Veel flexibiliteit, zodat je zelf de balans tussen werk en privé kan bepalen
Een aantrekkelijk loonpakket met verschillende aanvullende voordelen
Gratis reizen met de trein


DE WERKOMGEVING

Infrabel bouwt, onderhoudt en vernieuwt de spoorweginfrastructuur in België. Met zo’n 10.000 medewerkers werken we aan een betrouwbaar en modern spoorwegnet: om de mobiliteitsbehoeften van onze samenleving mee te ontwikkelen en bij te dragen aan een duurzame samenleving.

Bij Infrabel zijn we trots op ons Top Employer certificaat! Het is het resultaat van onze talrijke projecten op vlak van veiligheid en welzijn van onze collega's, maar ook voor ons ambitieus diversiteits- en inclusiebeleid. Telewerken, persoonlijke ontwikkeling, ergonomie, motivatie van het personeel en stressbeheer zijn maar enkele voorbeelden van de thema's waar we dagelijks aan werken.

WELKE STAPPEN DOORLOOP JE?

Solliciteer online > Wij nemen contact met je op > Selectiegesprek > (Medisch onderzoek >) Welkom bij Infrabel!

Heb je een beperking en kunnen redelijke aanpassingen je een vlotte sollicitatie ervaring garanderen? Laat het ons dan weten.

VRAGEN OVER DEZE VACATURE?

Ludovic Myttenaere, HR Talent Advisor | +32 2 432 57 89 | Ludovic.myttenaere@infrabel.be

Vergeet niet een profiel aan te maken via “Mijn Profiel”. Je kan er niet alleen je gegevens aanvullen, maar ook “job alerts” aanmaken volgens jouw interesses. Zo krijg je de nieuwe jobs die bij jou passen als eerste in je mailbox.

  • Je weet jouw communicatiestijl vlot aan te passen in functie van het moment, de situatie, de persoon… en stemt hierbij jouw boodschap af op de noden, achtergrond en verwachtingen van jouw doelpubliek.
  • Je draagt actief bij tot het creëren van een goede teamgeest en tot het bereiken van een gezamenlijk resultaat. Hierbij ontwikkel je positieve en effectieve werkrelaties.
  • Je beschikt over een sterk analytisch vermogen. Je identificeert de verschillende aspecten van dagelijkse problemen en legt hierbij relevante verbanden.
  • Je bent inventief en een geduldige doorzetter wat vereist is om projecten te realiseren in samenwerking met interne en externe partijen.

Infrabel wil de maatschappelijke diversiteit weerspiegeld zien in haar medewerkers. Jouw talenten en enthousiasme, daar draait het om, niet om je geslacht, leeftijd, origine of beperking.

ONS AANBOD

  • Een boeiende en afwisselende job
  • Bij een stabiel bedrijf dat bijdraagt aan een duurzame mobiliteit voor de samenleving
  • Talrijke opleidings- en doorgroeimogelijkheden: jij bent ondernemer van je eigen carrière
  • Veel flexibiliteit, zodat je zelf de balans tussen werk en privé kan bepalen
  • Een aantrekkelijk loonpakket met verschillende aanvullende voordelen
  • Gratis reizen met de trein

DE WERKOMGEVING

Infrabel bouwt, onderhoudt en vernieuwt de spoorweginfrastructuur in België. Met zo’n 10.000 medewerkers werken we aan een betrouwbaar en modern spoorwegnet: om de mobiliteitsbehoeften van onze samenleving mee te ontwikkelen en bij te dragen aan een duurzame samenleving.

Bij Infrabel zijn we trots op ons Top Employer certificaat! Het is het resultaat van onze talrijke projecten op vlak van veiligheid en welzijn van onze collega's, maar ook voor ons ambitieus diversiteits- en inclusiebeleid. Telewerken, persoonlijke ontwikkeling, ergonomie, motivatie van het personeel en stressbeheer zijn maar enkele voorbeelden van de thema's waar we dagelijks aan werken.

WELKE STAPPEN DOORLOOP JE?

Solliciteer online > Wij nemen contact met je op > Selectiegesprek > (Medisch onderzoek >) Welkom bij Infrabel!

Heb je een beperking en kunnen redelijke aanpassingen je een vlotte sollicitatie ervaring garanderen? Laat het ons dan weten.

VRAGEN OVER DEZE VACATURE?

Ludovic Myttenaere, HR Talent Advisor | +32 2 432 57 89 | Ludovic.myttenaere@infrabel.be

Vergeet niet een profiel aan te maken via “Mijn Profiel”. Je kan er niet alleen je gegevens aanvullen, maar ook “job alerts” aanmaken volgens jouw interesses. Zo krijg je de nieuwe jobs die bij jou passen als eerste in je mailbox.

Title: Developer
Description:
Kickstart 2025 with a new career opportunity In Brussels!

Contract Type: Freelance/B2B or Employee - you decide!

Start Date: Q1 / Q2 2025

Education: Secondary School (min)

Profile: European Passport holder




Ensures building and implementing of ICT solutions. Contributes to low-level design. Writes code to ensure optimum efficiency and functionality and user experience.




Tasks




• Develop engineer and integrate data stores, software components and systems.

• Follow user experience guidelines.

• Aware of and address known security vulnerabilities, applying security by design.

• Shape technical documentation.

• Provide advanced, component technical support.

• Resolve issues prior to and following testing.




Knowledge and skills




• Respect of development standards and best practices.

• Understanding of systems and application security.

• Work with RDBMS and queries in native SQL language.

• Object-orient development and scripting skills.

• Knowledge of APIs and integration technologies.

• Understands analysis and architectural documents (HLD, LLD, BPMN, UML...)




Technical certifications




• ServiceNow® Certified Application Developer or Specialist

• Microsoft Certified DevOps Engineer Expert

Title: Mobile Developer
Description:
On behalf of our client, a renown European institution, we are seeking for a Mobile Developer, willing to join their team in Brussels, Belgium (on-site).


Contractor employment model
No visa/relocation sponsorship provided



A day in the life of a Mobile Developer

As a mobile developer, your day involves designing and implementing web and mobile applications, analyzing and documenting requirements, and developing database schemas. You integrate systems, create prototypes, and maintain applications based on specifications. Additionally, you participate in meetings, perform testing, and contribute to software architecture, ensuring smooth deployment and up-to-date documentation.

Your day-to-day


Architecture, design and implementation of web/mobile applications
Analysis and documentation of requirements following the standards and methodologies established by the contracting authority
Participate in the analysis and design of database schemas/tables/etc
Data analysis and data modelling
Prototyping
Development/maintenance of applications that reflect the specifications
Design and development of architecture components and building blocks
Integration with other applications/systems
Production of technical documentation
Formulation and/or elaboration of test cases/programs
Participate in the deployment and configuration of the system (s)
Participation in meetings with the contracting authority, project teams and user groups
Perform design, development, unit/integration testing and maintenance of software that both follow the reference architecture rules and accurately implement the specifications received in the documents of analysis provided by the business analysts of the project
Contribute to the BPM platform solution architecture, propose innovative new designs and develop prototypes, rollout pilots
Produce and maintain up-to-date the software architecture and components design documentation, development manuals and tutorials to be used by the BPM development community at EC, based on the reference architecture
Prototype development of business processes and maintain BPM reference flows (business processes) to demonstrate the usage of new features/components added to the BPM platform
Provide technical scripts/documents and assistance with deployment and configuration of the system



Requirements


Excellent knowledge of Angular development framework (version 8 or newer)
Excellent knowledge of HTML5 and CSS
Good knowledge of development platforms (e.g. Ionic or a similar one) to develop mobile applications
Excellent knowledge of web (progressive) and/or mobile (native/hybrid) application design and development
Good knowledge of J2EE including Service Oriented Architecture (SOA) and web services
Good knowledge of Application Servers (e.g. Oracle WebLogic Server)
Good knowledge of Relational Database Management Systems (Oracle, Microsoft SQL, etc.)
Good knowledge of continuous delivery and Application Lifecycle Management tools (Bamboo, JIRA, Git, etc.)
Good knowledge of Spring and Spring boot
Ability to cope with fast changing technologies used in mobile application architecture, design and implementation
Very good communication skills
Ability to give efficient presentations to technical and non-technical audience



Benefits


The opportunity to work in a modern environment
A competitive compensation & benefits package
Continuous learning opportunities using the most modern methods (unlimited access to Udemy for Business, ad-hoc trainings)
A personalized development plan for targeted career growth
Show more

Title: Robotics Software Engineer – Onboard Autonomy
Description:
The Robotics Software and Intelligence (RSI) Division is responsible for the study, design, prototyping and development of state-of-the-art robotics products for our customers.




Position




The position involves engaging in the development of multi-agent mission planning for robotics systems. The successful candidate will be involved in the analysis, simulation, development, and testing of coordinated task and path planning for multi-agent systems, with integration into both offline control centres and onboard robotic platforms for real-time operations.




The position is central to projects spanning marine, terrestrial, and planetary robotics, contributing to applied research initiatives and on European Space Agency (ESA), European Commission (EC), as well as defence and commercial projects.




The successful candidate will be part of the Robotics, Software & Intelligence (RSI) Team.

The candidate will mainly report to the RSI Team Lead.




Location: Sint-Stevens-Woluwe (Brussels Area)
Start date: As of November 2024




Tasks and Responsibilities




Analyse and develop offline and online mission planning techniques composed of goal decomposition, tasks allocation, path/trajectory planning and adaptation to dynamic events using Artificial Intelligence (AI) or optimisation approaches
Develop command, control & intelligence software applications with integrated mission planning
Participate in the end-to-end implementation with testing, integration and optimisation of target robot architecture
Implement the developed technologies in the in-house robotic control centre and integrate them with mobile and underwater robots
Generate the technical documentation required all along the process.




Skills and Experience




MSc or PhD in relevant fields (e.g. AI/Machine Learning, robotics, computer science, software engineering)




Strong theoretical and practical background in:

Classical AI and/or optimisation techniques
Operational research
Planning domain description
Ontology based knowledge representation
Semantic reasoning - applied to multi-robot mission planning paradigms




In addition:

Very strong programming skills (C++, Python) on Linux environment and Git tools
Thorough experience of Software development in ROS and simulation in Gazebo
Strength to cope with schedules and deadlines
Fluent in English, both spoken and written with good skills in technical documentation delivery.




Considered as Assets




Knowledge of OWL, PDDL and other ontology representations
Machine Learning techniques (supervised, unsupervised, reinforcement learning) and Deep Learning via TensorFlow, Keras, etc.
Knowledge of web technologies such as JavaScript, Node.js, HTML5, etc.
Robotics software architectures (design), Robotics Middleware and Networks
Onboard autonomy
Continuous Integration methodologies.




Our Offer




Working within an exceptional sector with Staff located in Belgium, Germany and the Netherlands
A professional and modern working environment with motivated Administrative Staff, Engineers, Astronaut Training Instructors and Scientists coming from all different horizons and countries with a common passion for space and their own expertise
A full-time position with an indefinite contract of employment
A competitive remuneration package and good working conditions
Working from home in part can be a possibility
An individualised training and development programmes.




About Us




Space Applications Services is a Company at the forefront of space technology development and the provision of services for human spaceflight, exploration and earth observation missions. Headquartered in Belgium (Brussels Area), with a research office in the Netherlands and a subsidiary in the USA, the Company provides solutions for both commercial and institutional customers. We work with Clients such as the European Space Agency, the European Commission, governmental and national space agencies as well as the major space industries.

The Company develops payloads, avionics, robotics technology and products, and provides complete mission operations control centre solutions to EN9100 standards.

The Company also provides engineering, science and training services, including astronaut training.

From our headquarters, we are in daily contact with the International Space Station (ISS) ensuring our Customers’ research is successful.




How To Apply




Upload your CV, Motivation Letter and a Reference Letter, to the attention of Mr Shashank Govindaraj.




The candidate shall be eligible to work in the European Union for a couple of years.

Show more

Title: Cientista de dados Jr
HTML:
Responsabilidades da Oportunidade

O time de Data Science do Magalu está à procura de Cientista de Dados para nos ajudar a desenvolver soluções analíticas para diversos problemas de negócios (relacionados a fraude, projeção de demanda, precificação, sortimento, marketing, logística, investimentos, entre outros), utilizando técnicas de Machine Learning e Inteligência Artificial.

  • Entendimento das necessidades de negócios;
  • Criação de hipóteses para solução dos problemas de negócio em questão;
  • Realização de análises descritivas, diagnósticas, preditivas e/ou prescritivas;
  • Criação de modelos estatísticos / de machine learning e otimizadores;
  • Identificação, recomendação e implementação de oportunidades de melhoria relacionadas aos problemas de negócio abordados;
  • Criação de métricas e acompanhamento de performance das soluções criadas, buscando melhorias contínuas
  • Exposição / apresentação dos trabalhos realizados e resultados obtidos para as áreas de negócio e executivos da empresa.

Requisitos

Requisitos Obrigatórios

  • Graduação completa;
  • Conhecimento em linguagens de programação (ex: C, Python, Java, R, etc);
  • Aptidão e interesse em programação; Interesse por Ciência de Dados;
  • Conhecimentos e experiência em Data Science (ex: Regressões, Classificações, segmentações, etc.);
  • Experiência em modelagem de dados;
  • Visão de negócios; Alta capacidade de comunicação;
  • Facilidade em trabalhar em times / engajar com pares e parceiros de negócios.

Requisitos Desejáveis

  • Conhecimentos em estatística;
  • Conhecimento de ferramentas de Big Data (e.g., Hadoop, Hive e Spark);
  • Portfólio de projetos relacionados à Ciência de Dados (Github, Kaggle etc.);
  • Experiência na área.

Diversidade

O Magalu promove a diversidade.

Aqui você é bem-vindx em todas as vagas independentemente de gênero, orientação sexual, raça, etnia ou deficiência.

Benefícios

  • Academia / Práticas Esportivas
  • Assist. Médica
  • Assist. Odontológica
  • Bicicletário
  • Bolsa de Estudo
  • Desconto em Produtos
  • Estacionamento
  • Poss. Horário Flexível
  • Seguro de Vida
  • Vale-Alimentação
  • Vale-Refeição
  • Vale-Transporte

Title: Fellow Data Scientist
Description:
Sobre nós

Muitos acham que sonhamos grande demais, mas na XP Inc. acreditamos no impossível. Nossa história começou em 2001, com um pequeno escritório de agentes autônomos de investimentos em Porto Alegre e hoje somos um grande ecossistema de serviços financeiros, mídia e educação.

Chegamos até aqui com a dedicação de equipes talentosas que tiveram garra, determinação, resiliência e, acima de tudo, ambição para fazer acontecer. Sabemos que o que nos trouxe até aqui, não é o mesmo que vai nos levar adiante, mas seguiremos juntos, transformando o mercado financeiro.

Nossos valores


Foco no cliente: Somos obstinados em superar as expectativas dos nossos clientes, sempre colocando-os em primeiro lugar nas nossas decisões.
Sonho grande: Miramos no impossível, acreditamos que ele pode se tornar realidade, e chegamos lá juntos, um passo de cada vez.
Mente aberta: Nossa abertura para o novo e nossa capacidade de adaptação são o que nos fazem evoluir e melhorar sempre.
Espírito empreendedor: Construímos o futuro com nossas próprias mãos com o mais alto nível de comprometimento e sentimento de dono.


Se identificou com a nossa cultura? Então embarque nesse foguete! 🚀

>> Sobre a vaga

Como cientista de dados, com apoio do centro de excelência de Data Science & Machine Learning, essa pessoa será responsável por construir produtos de dados para otimizar tomada de decisão na companhia, como modelos de classificação, otimização de heurísticas e análises estatísticas.

Principais Responsabilidades


Responsável por análises e soluções estatísticos e de machine learning, entendendo os fenômenos para transcrever em dados e variáveis, e desenvolvendo modelos preditivos e não supervisionados..


>> Para esta vaga, é essencial:


Conhecimento em Python.
Experiência com modelos de Machine Learning e modelos estatísticos.


>> Você pode ter destaque se:


Pragmático, equilibrando qualidade e simplicidade, garantindo que estamos resolvendo problemas práticos e reais.
Se adaptar às mudanças e adversidades.
Trabalhar bem em equipe, colaborando com time de entrega e capítulo de Data Science, aproveitando conhecimento e capacidade das pessoas em diferentes áreas da XP.
Mostrar proatividade, ownership e capacidade de buscar conhecimento.
Conhecimento em PySpark.


Saiba mais sobre nosso dia a dia no Instagram CLICANDO AQUI

Confira nossas avaliações no Glassdoor CLICANDO AQUI

“Se te oferecem um lugar em um foguete, não pergunte qual é o assento, apenas embarque.”

Sheryl Sandberg

Benefícios Que Oferecemos


Saúde e bem-estar: plano de saúde, plano odontológico, Gympass , Zenklub , VA, VR, New Value , seguro de vida.
Maternidade e Paternidade: auxílio creche para pais e mães, licença maternidade de 6 meses, licença paternidade de 20 dias.
Só na XP Inc.: assessoria de investimento e acesso a fundos de investimentos exclusivos.


Jornada de trabalho com flexibilidade

O nosso modelo de trabalho varia de acordo com a função: preferencialmente presencial para frentes de negócio, predominantemente remoto para times de tecnologia e híbrido para as demais equipes. É importante ressaltar que todos os colaboradores precisam morar na localidade da vaga (nossa sede está localizada na cidade de São Paulo e é onde temos o maior número de posições), já que temos atividades que exigem a presença física para promover a colaboração e os rituais da nossa cultura. Esses encontros são organizados de acordo com as orientações dos líderes e as particularidades de cada rotina, para que nossos colaboradores possam exercer suas jornadas de trabalho com liberdade e autonomia.
Show more

Title: Desenvolvedor(a) Junior
HTML:
Estamos entre as 150 melhores empresas para se trabalhar pelo oitavo ano consecutivo. São 8 milhões de usuários, mais de 500 mil estabelecimentos comerciais afiliados, 100 mil empresas clientes, 350 milhões de refeições por ano e 55 milhões de transações por mês.

Oferecemos os melhores benefícios do mercado e fazemos questão de também promover a melhor experiência profissional para quem ajuda a construir nossa história de sucesso: nosso time!

Aqui a gente evoluí com as trocas, se importa com cada cliente e temos muito orgulho em fazer a diferença no mundo. Por isso, arriscamos, corrigimos e surpreendemos a todo momento, ECOAndo nossa cultura de dentro para fora e criando nosso jeito Alelo de ser! Respeitamos as diferenças e valorizamos a diversidade e equidade de gênero, raça, cor, religião, deficiências, orientação sexual, ascendência ou idade porque juntos somos mais fortes, somos únicos! E aí, deu match?!😉

Como Será o Seu Dia a Dia

  • Atuação em metodologias Ágeis, participando das cerimônias como: Dailys, Reviews, Retrôs e Refinamentos.
  • Executar a integração de dados em ambientes híbridos on-premise e na nuvem.
  • Apoiará as áreas de negócios internas sobre estratégias para implantação de novas regras de negócio.

Requisitos mínimos

  • Ter perfil curioso, principalmente com novas tecnologias, ter vontade de aprender e ensinar e ser comunicativo.
  • Ser disciplinado, organizado, responsável, comprometido e pró-ativo.
  • Formação Acadêmica em Tecnologia ou áreas correlatas.
  • Conhecimento em ferramentas:
  • soluções da AWS, como PySpark, Python, Dynamo, Glue e S3
  • soluções de BE como Java e Spring Boot
  • Bancos de Dados como Oracle, MongoDB, DocumentDB e SQL
  • Soluções de Business Inteligence como Power BI

O Que Você Vai Encontrar

  • Oportunidades de crescimento e desenvolvimento;
  • Práticas de meritocracia e reconhecimento;
  • Ambiente de trabalho criativo e descontraído;
  • Prática consolidada de Home Office;
  • No dress-code;
  • Flexibilidade de horários e sextas feiras terminando às 16h (happy Friday);
  • Alelo Refeição, Alimentação e Aux. Farmácia;
  • Benefícios Mobilidade (Combustível ou VT ou Fretado, reembolso de pedágio e estacionamento);
  • Ótimo Plano de Saúde, Plano Odontológico e Seguro de Vida;
  • Gympass;
  • Previdência Privada;
  • Auxílio Creche;
  • Muita transparência! Aqui, você encontrará um ambiente que valoriza feedbacks e 1:1.

Title: DATA SCIENTIST PLENO
Description:
Sobre o Bradesco

Trazendo um pouco mais da nossa história de contribuição e impacto na sociedade, com pioneirismo e inovação, o Bradesco surgiu com o propósito de democratizar o acesso aos serviços bancários no Brasil. Nesses 81 anos, sempre ao lado dos brasileiros, nos tornamos uma das maiores Organizações do país, formada por empresas e fundações que oferecem produtos e serviços que vão de soluções financeiras a seguros, saúde e educação.

E estamos sempre em busca de pessoas dispostas a fazer a diferença na vida de milhões de brasileiros, contribuindo para o desenvolvimento da sociedade.

Responsabilidades e atribuições

A área é responsável pelo desenvolvimento e monitoramento de modelos estatísticos e estudos analíticos que subsidiam as ações e estratégias de recuperação de créditos.

Acreditamos em um ambiente colaborativo e que propicia o desenvolvimento dos profissionais.

Modelo de trabalho : Híbrido, sendo 2 dias na semana presencial

Local: Cidade de Deus, Osasco

Como será seu dia a dia?

Estamos ampliando o uso de modelagem e analytics para gerar ainda mais valor às ações e estratégias de recuperação de créditos. Nosso desafio passa por atuar de forma ágil com as demais estruturas e cada vez mais fazer uso de machine learning, inteligência artificial generativa e atuar em cloud.

As principais atividades serão:



Desenvolver estudos analíticos que tragam insumos para aumentar a recuperação de créditos de clientes inadimplentes. Estes estudos dependem de grande interação com as áreas de negócio para garantir que os entregáveis considerem todas as frentes envolvidas e agreguem valor para o Banco;
Desenvolver modelos estatísticos de cobrança (collection score e recovery score) utilizando as mais robustas técnicas quantitativas e os principais ambientes/ferramentas analíticas disponíveis. Estes modelos trazem diversos insights para as ações e estratégias de recuperação de créditos;
Relacionamento com as demais áreas do departamento e interação com os segmentos de negócio para entender como a atividade se insere no todo e otimizar a atuação;
Propor a utilização de novas fontes de informação e bases de dados mais tempestivas que possam alavancar os resultados dos modelos e dos estudos. Deve possuir familiaridade para navegar nos diversos ambientes analíticos e visão quantitativa para testar a geração de valor das novas informações no negócio;
Avaliar e monitorar os estudos e modelos desenvolvidos, com o intuito de garantir que sempre estejam aderentes. Em caso de descolamentos, deverá atuar para adequar a métrica ou propor uma nova metodologia.



Requisitos e Qualificações

O que você precisa ter ou saber?



Formação em Estatística, Engenharias, Matemática e outros cursos de ciências exatas;
Habilidades avançadas com técnicas e ferramentas quantitativas como Regressão, Machine Learning, IA, Databricks, entre outros;
Conhecimento em geração de dados, lógica e linguagens de programação.



Será um diferencial se você tiver:



Conhecimento ou grande interesse em crédito e cobrança;
Domínio no emprego de técnicas quantitativas;
Flexibilidade e adaptabilidade a mudanças.



O que nós oferecemos

No Bradesco valorizamos a saúde e bem-estar, oferecendo um extenso portfólio de benefícios as todas nossas pessoas colaboradoras.



PLR ou Bônus: Conforme a elegibilidade de cargo*
Convênio Médico
Convênio Odontológico
Seguro de Vida
Vale Alimentação
Vale Refeição
Total Pass
13º Cesta Alimentação
Vale Transporte (adesão opcional)
Descontos em produtos e serviços em empresas parceiras
Previdência Privada (adesão opcional, com participação financeira da Organização Bradesco)
Viva Bem Bradesco: programa de saúde, bem-estar e qualidade de vida
Unibrad: Universidade Corporativa Bradesco
Isenção de Tarifas: condições especiais em diversos produtos e serviços
Auxílio Creche ou Babá
Licença Paternidade estendida de 20 dias
Licença Maternidade de 180 dias, acompanhamento assistencial da gestação até o pós-parto
Auxílio para filho atípico*



Saiba mais sobre o Bradesco

Para mais informações sobre as nossas práticas de gestão de pessoas e indicadores, acesse bradescori.com.br/o-bradesco/capital-humano/ .

Para mais informações institucionais, de negócios e financeiras, além das práticas e iniciativas de sustentabilidade, acesse bradescori.com.br/o-bradesco/relatorio-integrado/ .

Title: DATA SCIENTIST PLENO
Description:
Data Scientist Pleno




Sobre o Bradesco




Trazendo um pouco mais da nossa história de contribuição e impacto na sociedade, com pioneirismo e inovação, o Bradesco surgiu com o propósito de democratizar o acesso aos serviços bancários no Brasil. Nesses 81 anos, sempre ao lado dos brasileiros, nos tornamos uma das maiores Organizações do país, formada por empresas e fundações que oferecem produtos e serviços que vão de soluções financeiras a seguros, saúde e educação.

E estamos sempre em busca de pessoas dispostas a fazer a diferença na vida de milhões de brasileiros, contribuindo para o desenvolvimento da sociedade.




Responsabilidades e atribuições




O que é o nosso time de Crédito?




O Departamento de Políticas de Crédito é responsável por desenvolver, implementar e monitorar as políticas de crédito da Organização Bradesco, focando em produtos parcelados. Sua missão é assegurar que as decisões de crédito sejam tomadas com qualidade, agilidade e segurança, alinhadas às normas e políticas internas. Atuam em conjunto com os Gerentes/Segmentos e demais envolvidos para garantir o uso adequado dos sistemas, rotinas e informações, desde a concessão ou renovação de crédito até a efetiva liquidação das operações.

Modelo de trabalho: híbrido

Local: Osasco, SP




Como será seu dia a dia?




Sendo Data Scientist Pleno suas principais atividades serão:




Desenvolver e ajustar novas políticas de crédito com base em análises de dados;
Realizar estudos e investigações sobre o perfil dos clientes para embasar decisões estratégicas;
Acompanhar o portfólio de crédito, incluindo inadimplência, taxa de aprovação e performance da carteira.




Requisitos e Qualificações




O que você precisa ter ou saber?




Vivência com as linguagens de programação: SAS, SQL, Python;
Experiência na manipulação de grandes bases de dados;
Conhecimento do ciclo de crédito;
Experiência com CRM para extração e análise de informações de clientes;
Familiaridade com o desenvolvimento de parametrizações para produtos financeiros




O que nós oferecemos




No Bradesco valorizamos a saúde e bem-estar, oferecendo um extenso portfólio de benefícios as todas nossas pessoas colaboradoras.

  • Isenção de Tarifas: condições especiais em diversos produtos e serviços
  • Auxílio Creche ou Babá
  • Licença Paternidade estendida de 20 dias
  • Licença Maternidade de 180 dias, acompanhamento assistencial da gestação até o pós-parto


Saiba mais sobre o Bradesco

Para mais informações sobre as nossas práticas de gestão de pessoas e indicadores, acesse bradescori.com.br/o-bradesco/capital-humano/ .

Para mais informações institucionais, de negócios e financeiras, além das práticas e iniciativas de sustentabilidade, acesse bradescori.com.br/o-bradesco/relatorio-integrado/ .

Title: Cientista de Dados Sr.
Description:
Somos o PAN

Ágeis, flexíveis e criativos, exploramos possibilidades com disposição e desejo de fazer acontecer. Sempre prontos para encarar novos desafios, nutrimos líderes que, além de ter garra, são abertos e empáticos, veem na proximidade das relações, o elo entre cada um.

Nossa missão, se faz cumprida quando transformamos a vida dos outros através dos nossos conhecimentos. Nossos pilares de cultura, reforçam nossa postura idealizadora e com desejo de fazer acontecer: T rabalho em equipe, O usadia empreendedora e P rotagonismo com profundidade.

Dominamos nossos processos e trazemos melhorias para quem deseja ter uma vida financeira mais inteligente.

Principais desafios:


Atuar no desenvolvimento de modelos de Machine Learning e metodologias correlacionadas;
Atuar no desenvolvimento de modelos de NLP;
Propor metodologias para solução de problemas de negócio, auxiliando e gerando insights para o time de dados;
Realizar a manutenção e atualização de modelos;
Criar modelos desafiantes aos modelos existentes;
Atuar na mensuração de resultados e monitoramento de modelos;
Participar de discussões de estudos corporativos, envolvendo todas as áreas do banco, por exemplo: cobrança, atendimento, conversão de negócios.


Quais as principais competências para a posição?


Formação em Estatística, Ciência da Computação, Matemática, Física, Engenharia ou áreas relacionadas;
Experiência na área de Machine Learning;
Experiência em Python, principalmente bibliotecas relacionadas a ML;
Conhecimento avançado em SQL;
Conhecimento em Data Lake.


Diferencial:


Experiência em modelos de NLP;
Conhecimento em produtos bancários;
Conhecimento em serviços AWS;
Conhecimento em ferramentas de MLOps;
Conhecimento em modelos de IA Generativa.


Modelo de atuação: Híbrido (4 dias presenciais no escritório e 1 dia de home office)

Benefícios do PAN:


Bônus / PLR 🤑
Vale Refeição 🍔
Vale Alimentação 🍝
13º de Vale Alimentação 🤌
Convênio Médico (internação em apartamento para titular e dependentes) 🏥
Convênio Odonto/Ortodôntico 😁
Ambulatório Médico no escritório 🚑
Telemedicina Dr. Alper (Einstein Conecta) ilimitado. 🩺
Seguro de Vida ❤
Descontos em mais de 10 mil farmácias 💊
4 Sessões de psicoterapia por mês 🤝
Licença familiar estendida (Responsável 6 meses e corresponsável 30 dias) 👨‍🍼🤱
Auxílio Creche / Babá 🎒
AcomPANha (programa de acompanhamento para gestantes) 🫃🤰
Gympass/Totalpass 💪
Auxílio tecnologia assistivas (reembolso de 85% para colaboradores com deficiência) 🦻🦽
Day Off Aniversário 🎉
Day Off Tempo de Casa 🕛
Programa de reconhecimento por tempo de casa 🏆
Programas de desenvolvimento 📚
Gamificação em certificações e desenvolvimento (BitPANs) 🎫
Massagem e Auriculoterapia 💆‍♀️💆‍♂️
Salão de beleza no escritório 💇‍♂️💅
PAE (Orientação Jurídica, Financeira, Psicológica e Social) 🧑‍🎓
Serviço Social 🤗
Portal de descontos em diversos segmentos (Allya) 🤑
Campanha de vacinação (colaborador e dependente) 💉
Facilitação no financiamento de veículos 🚗
Cartão de crédito PAN com limite diferenciado 💳
Vale Transporte (desconto de apenas 4%) 🚆
Assistência Funeral 🤍


Assim como todas as nossas vagas, essa também é destinada à diversidade e inclusão. Independentemente de qualquer fator, perfil ou característica, Eleve sua carreira a PAN !

Para conhecer mais sobre nossos benefícios e cultura, acesse o Trabalhe Conosco:

https://www.bancopan.com.br/trabalhe-conosco/

Acesse também nossa página na Glassdoor e veja nossas avaliações:

https://www.glassdoor.com.br/Vis%C3%A3o-geral/Trabalhar-na-Banco-PAN-EI_IE1184444.13,22.ht

Title: Cientista de Dados Sr.
Description:
Somos o PAN

Ágeis, flexíveis e criativos, exploramos possibilidades com disposição e desejo de fazer acontecer. Sempre prontos para encarar novos desafios, nutrimos líderes que, além de ter garra, são abertos e empáticos, veem na proximidade das relações, o elo entre cada um.

Nossa missão, se faz cumprida quando transformamos a vida dos outros através dos nossos conhecimentos. Nossos pilares de cultura, reforçam nossa postura idealizadora e com desejo de fazer acontecer: T rabalho em equipe, O usadia empreendedora e P rotagonismo com profundidade.

Dominamos nossos processos e trazemos melhorias para quem deseja ter uma vida financeira mais inteligente.

Principais desafios:


Desenvolver modelos preditivos para tomada de decisão da área de crédito (application score, behaviour score);
Validar modelos estatísticos desenvolvidos por outras áreas de modelagem do banco através da replicabilidade dos dados e crítica das metodologias empregadas;
Conduzir análises para identificação dos principais problemas de negócio (crédito e fraude) e gerar soluções data-driven;
Explorar os diversos conjuntos de dados e informações, buscando melhorias para os modelos e oportunidades para o negócio;
Aprimoramento dos painéis de monitoramentos de modelos e indicadores de crédito para recomendar melhorias nos processos decisórios existentes;
Atuar no processo de deploy de serviços preditivos - MLOps.


Quais as principais competências para a posição?


Formação acadêmica em cursos de exatas (Matemática, Física, Estatística e Engenharias);
Conhecimento de ferramentas computacionais de análise de dados (Python, SQL, Office, Tableau, AWS, GitHub , etc);
Conhecimento sobre técnicas estatísticas de Machine Learning para problemas de clusterização, regressão e classificação;
Perfil analítico e com foco na solução de problemas complexos.


Modelo de atuação: Híbrido (4 dias presencial no escritório e 1 dia de home office)
